meta.name: One Pace
meta.description: One Pace is a fan project that recuts the One Piece anime in an endeavor to bring it more in line with the pacing of the original manga by Eiichiro Oda. The team accomplishes this by removing filler scenes not present in the source material. This process requires meticulous editing and quality control to ensure seamless music and transitions.

videos.title: Romance Dawn, the Dawn of an Adventure
videos.overview:
Influenced by the straw-hat-wearing pirate Red-Haired Shanks, an enthusiastic young boy named Monkey D. Luffy dreams of one day becoming King of the Pirates.

Manga Chapter(s): 1
Anime Episode(s): 312

videos.title: They Call Him "Straw Hat" Luffy
videos.overview:
While Alvida and her pirates plunder a cruise ship, they come across a barrel containing a strange boy named Monkey D. Luffy. The timid Koby befriends Luffy, and they share their grand dreams with each other.

Manga Chapter(s): 2
Anime Episode(s): 1

videos.title: The Pirate King and the Master Swordsman
videos.overview:
In search of members for his pirate crew, Luffy with his new friend Koby arrive at Shells Town. There, they track down the renowned Pirate Hunter Zoro but run afoul of Helmeppo, son of the infamous Captain Morgan.

Manga Chapter(s): 3-4
Anime Episode(s): 2, 19

videos.title: The First
videos.overview:
Luffy convinces the captive Zoro to join his pirate crew, but they must first defeat the tyrannical Captain Morgan.

Manga Chapter(s): 5-7
Anime Episode(s): 3

videos.title: Enter: Nami
videos.overview:
Nami, a street-smart girl who loves money and tangerines, makes Luffy's acquaintance. To save herself and steal a map to the Grand Line, she tricks Luffy into allowing her to turn him over to the infamous pirate Buggy the Clown.

Manga Chapter(s): 8-11
Anime Episode(s): 4-6

videos.title: Treasure
videos.overview:
Luffy meets a small dog guarding his late master's store. Meanwhile, Beast Tamer Mohji, Cabaji the Acrobat, and the lion Richie show up in the streets of Orange Town to get revenge for Captain Buggy's humiliating loss.

Manga Chapter(s): 12-19
Anime Episode(s): 6-7

videos.title: Pirate Buggy "the Clown"
videos.overview:
Shockingly, it turns out Captain Buggy and Red-Haired Shanks share a common history. When the bombastic clown rips Shanks' straw hat, Luffy's rage knows no bounds.

Manga Chapter(s): 19-21
Anime Episode(s): 8

videos.title: Captain Usopp
videos.overview:
With Nami joining as Luffy's navigator (though not as an actual member of the crew), they arrive at Syrup Village in search of a proper ship. There they meet a man claiming to be a pirate captain who also seems to have ties to Red-Haired Shanks.

Manga Chapter(s): 23-25
Anime Episode(s): 9-10

videos.title: Captain Kuro
videos.overview:
After uncovering a devious plot, Usopp warns the village and Kaya, but finds his years of lying make it difficult to convince people of the truth.

Manga Chapter(s): 26-27
Anime Episode(s): 10-11

videos.title: The Slope
videos.overview:
Usopp resolves that if he is to keep the peace, the town must continue to believe he is a liar, which means he cannot let Captain Kuro's men up the slope to the village! Luffy, Zoro, and Nami aid Usopp in his plan to keep the Black Cat Pirates at bay.

Manga Chapter(s): 28-30
Anime Episode(s): 12-13

videos.title: The Silent Man
videos.overview:
Captain Kuro makes his appearance, and with Zoro too injured to fight, Luffy incapacitated, and Usopp and Nami too weak to make a stand, the situation is desperate. However, Kaya herself arrives, intent on bargaining with Kuro.

Manga Chapter(s): 31-34
Anime Episode(s): 13-14

videos.title: The Pirate "Kuro of a Hundred Plans"
videos.overview:
While the fight between Luffy and Kuro continues, Jango works to force Kaya to bequeath her family's money to the Black Cat captain. Despite the Usopp Pirates' efforts to stop the hypnotist, it seems as if the transaction is all but inevitable.

Manga Chapter(s): 35-37
Anime Episode(s): 15-16

videos.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
videos.overview:
Kuro's ultimate move attacks everything in the area, friend nor foe notwithstanding, and Luffy becomes enraged by Kuro's lack of regard for his crew.

Manga Chapter(s): 38-39
Anime Episode(s): 16-17

videos.title: To the Sea
videos.overview:
The island is saved without any villagers ever knowing what almost befell their home. Kaya, grateful to the Straw Hats for what they did, gifts them something invaluable for sailing the high seas. Meanwhile, one more person joins Luffy's crew.

Manga Chapter(s): 40-41
Anime Episode(s): 17

videos.title: You're the Rare Breed
videos.overview:
With Usopp now on the crew and their new ship, the Going Merry, under their command, the Straw Hats head to an island said to hold a fabled treasure. There they encounter a strange man stuck in a box who has been looking for the same treasure.

Manga Chapter(s): 42, 22
Anime Episode(s): 18

videos.title: Enter: Sanji
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats happen across Zoro's former partners, Yosaku and Johnny, whose dietary dilemma reminds the pirates they still need a cook on their ship. Thus, they set sail for the sea restaurant Baratie, hoping to snag a chef.

Manga Chapter(s): 42-44
Anime Episode(s): 19-21

videos.title: Pirate Commodore Don Krieg
videos.overview:
Luffy is on hiatus from pirating to work as a cabin boy to pay off the damage done to the Baratie. While he tries to convince Sanji to join his crew, the pirate Gin brings the infamous Don Krieg and his starving forces to the sea restaurant.

Manga Chapter(s): 45-47
Anime Episode(s): 21-23

videos.title: The Oath
videos.overview:
As Nami steals the Going Merry, Hawk-Eye Mihawk, known far and wide as the world's greatest swordsman, arrives all the way from the Grand Line to finish off Don Krieg. However, Zoro challenges the deadly Mihawk to a duel in order to achieve his dream.

Manga Chapter(s): 48-52
Anime Episode(s): 23-24, 29, 135

videos.title: Pearl
videos.overview:
Mihawk departs after defeating Zoro, and Krieg continues his assault on the Baratie. Pearl, one of Krieg's strongest men, goes on the offensive with fiery attacks and multiple shields at his disposal, so Sanji reveals his unique fighting style.

Manga Chapter(s): 53-55
Anime Episode(s): 25

videos.title: Because of a Dream
videos.overview:
Sanji continues to battle Pearl, but Gin cleverly holds Chef Zeff hostage, forcing Sanji an impossible situation. Sanji's childhood memories flood his mind, and he reflects on why Zeff means so much to him.

Manga Chapter(s): 56-59
Anime Episode(s): 26

videos.title: MH5
videos.overview:
In a surprising twist, Gin finishes Pearl off himself, claiming Sanji as his own target. Though still wounded, Sanji rises to the challenge and faces off with Gin. As the battle draws to a close, Don Krieg unleashes a deadly toxin into the air.

Manga Chapter(s): 59-63
Anime Episode(s): 27-28

videos.title: The Stalwart War Spear
videos.overview:
The struggle with Krieg nears its end. Luffy's fighting spirit is unwavering, even after taking several hits from Krieg's Stalwart War Spear. Straw Hat's strategy shifts to smashing through Krieg's defenses and attacking the spear head-on.

Manga Chapter(s): 63-67
Anime Episode(s): 28-29

videos.title: The Fourth
videos.overview:
As the dust of battle settles, the still poisoned Gin decides to go back to the Grand Line with Krieg, and Sanji makes the difficult decision to join Luffy's crew. Suddenly, Yosaku returns with news of where Nami took the Going Merry.

Manga Chapter(s): 67-68
Anime Episode(s): 30

videos.title: Arlong Park
videos.overview:
As they depart the Baratie in pursuit of Nami and the Going Merry, Yosaku warns Luffy and Sanji about the vicious Arlong and his fishman underlings. Meanwhile, Usopp, Johnny, and Zoro make landfall where Nami docked the Merry.

Manga Chapter(s): 69-71
Anime Episode(s): 31-32

videos.title: Monsters of the Grand Line
videos.overview:
Usopp, having challenged the fishmen, has been caught. To effectively prove her loyalty to the Arlong Pirates, Nami is left with a morbid choice.

Manga Chapter(s): 71-73
Anime Episode(s): 32-33

videos.title: Sea Charts and Fishmen
videos.overview:
Luffy's group has reached the island but are met with a shocking revelation. Unmoved by Nami's apparent actions and her insistence that he leaves, Luffy stubbornly sticks around.

Manga Chapter(s): 74-76
Anime Episode(s): 33-34

videos.title: Bell-mère
videos.overview:
Nojiko goes into detail about Nami's childhood and their adoptive mother Bell-mère, a former Marine. Despite being poor and unrelated by blood, they had a happy life on their tangerine orchard.

Manga Chapter(s): 77-78
Anime Episode(s): 34-36

videos.title: Live
videos.overview:
When a Marine officer under Arlong's pay confiscates all the money Nami accumulated over the years, it becomes clear where Arlong stands on his promise.

Manga Chapter(s): 79-81
Anime Episode(s): 36-37

videos.title: OK, LET'S STAND UP
videos.overview:
Nami's audible sorrows have reached the ears of a certain Straw Hat captain, and he and his crew rise to action. The villagers look on in awe as the Straw Hats boldly enter Arlong Park to face the fishmen.

Manga Chapter(s): 82-84
Anime Episode(s): 38-39

videos.title: Chivalry vs. Fishman Karate
videos.overview:
Luffy's newest move leaves him incapacitated and at the mercy of the sea while Zoro, Sanji, and Usopp desperately fight off Arlong's top officers.

Manga Chapter(s): 85-88
Anime Episode(s): 39-40

videos.title: My Turn
videos.overview:
The top officers are defeated, but as they currently are, Sanji and Zoro prove to be no match for Arlong. However, with Luffy finally free, he just may just be able to pull it off. Meanwhile, Nami finally gathers the courage to face Arlong.

Manga Chapter(s): 88-90
Anime Episode(s): 40-42

videos.title: Happiness
videos.overview:
Luffy springs into action against Arlong, and their intense struggle commences! Luffy becomes enraged when he discovers how exactly Arlong had been using Nami, and he comes to a quick decision on how to finally free her of her shackles.

Manga Chapter(s): 91-94
Anime Episode(s): 42-43

videos.title: Spin, Pinwheel, Spin
videos.overview:
Arlong's reign of terror is over, so the island throws a party to celebrate their freedom and to honor their pirate saviors. During the festivities, Nami makes her decision to officially join the Straw Hat Pirates.

Manga Chapter(s): 94-95
Anime Episode(s): 43-44

videos.title: The Adventures of Buggy's Crew
videos.overview:
Buggy, after being defeated by Luffy, Zoro, and Nami, begins his quest to regain his body parts and his crew, and then he will get his flashy revenge on Luffy.

Manga Chapter(s): 35-75
Anime Episode(s): 46-47

videos.title: The Town of Beginnings and Endings
videos.overview:
Touting a fresh bounty issued by Marine HQ, Luffy and co. make landfall at Loguetown, the place where Gold Roger was both born and executed. Being the last stop before the Grand Line, the crew stocks up on supplies and sightsees.

Manga Chapter(s): 96-97
Anime Episode(s): 45, 48-49

videos.title: Parallels
videos.overview:
Usopp manages to anger the brat daughter of bounty hunter Daddy the Father and finds his own life at stake. When Daddy discovers that Usopp is the son of Red Hair Pirate Yasopp, the only man to beat him, he offers him a risky way out.

Manga Chapter(s): 97
Anime Episode(s): 48, 50

videos.title: The Legend Has Begun
videos.overview:
Luffy arrives at the execution platform, only to be caught in Buggy and Alvida's trap. Sanji and Zoro rush to stop Buggy from poetically—and flashily—executing Luffy where Roger died.

Manga Chapter(s): 98-100
Anime Episode(s): 52-53

videos.title: Reverse Mountain
videos.overview:
Following a near disaster in the Calm Belt, the Straw Hats take a wild ride up and down a mountain... and are promptly swallowed by a giant whale!

Manga Chapter(s): 101-102
Anime Episode(s): 54-55, 61-62

videos.title: Cape Promise
videos.overview:
After learning of Laboon the whale's plight, Luffy comes up with a solution befitting his style. As thanks, Crocus reveals that navigating the Grand Line will not be as simple as following a compass or relying on currents and wind.

Manga Chapter(s): 103-105
Anime Episode(s): 62-63

videos.title: The Town of Welcome
videos.overview:
As the Straw Hat Pirates travel from Reverse Mountain to Whisky Peak, Nami adjusts to having to watch the log pose constantly. When they arrive at their destination, the townspeople greet them warmly, despite the sight of their Jolly Roger.

Manga Chapter(s): 106-109
Anime Episode(s): 64-65

videos.title: The Secret Criminal Organization
videos.overview:
As Mr. 5 and Miss Valentine chase after the fleeing princess Vivi, Igaram begs Zoro to save her. But just when Zoro is about to take on Vivi's assailants, an enraged Luffy confronts him under a massive misunderstanding of the swordsman's latest actions.

Manga Chapter(s): 110-114
Anime Episode(s): 65-67

videos.title: The Trials of Koby-Meppo
videos.overview:
Koby and Helmeppo are new cabin boys for the Marines, but they become unwillingly involved in an escape attempt by Morgan. Their bravery will either earn them the respect of their superiors—as well as Vice Admiral Garp—or it will spell their doom.

Manga Chapter(s): 83-119
Anime Episode(s): 68-69

videos.title: Adventure on Little Garden
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats arrive at their destination and discover that the island is home to enormous creatures... and people. Meanwhile, the Baroque Works agents Mr. 3 and his partner Miss Golden Week receive new orders.

Manga Chapter(s): 115-117
Anime Episode(s): 70-71

videos.title: Dorry and Brogy
videos.overview:
Usopp, immensely impressed with the giants of Elbaph, names Brogy his master. To commemorate their duel, the giants imbibe two barrels of booze from Nami, but, unbeknownst to anyone, a saboteur has tampered with one of them!

Manga Chapter(s): 117-118
Anime Episode(s): 71-72

videos.title: Foul Play
videos.overview:
Despite his internal injuries and Luffy's warnings, the prideful giant Dorry insists on continuing his duel with Brogy. Meanwhile, the Baroque Works officer agents begin to make their move on the island with the Straw Hats as their next targets.

Manga Chapter(s): 119-122
Anime Episode(s): 73-74

videos.title: Luffy vs. Mr. 3
videos.overview:
Luffy, Usopp, and Karoo launch headlong into rescuing their friends, but Miss Golden Week runs a colorful interference. Mr. 3 is forced to take matters into his own conniving hands, and Usopp brainstorms how he will finally free his friends.

Manga Chapter(s): 123-126
Anime Episode(s): 75-76

videos.title: Straight Ahead!!
videos.overview:
Sanji, pretending to be Mr. 3, convinces Crocodile he has eliminated Vivi and co., prompting the Unluckies to arrive and deliver a way off Little Garden. With a clear path straight ahead—or so it seems—the Straw Hats set sail.

Manga Chapter(s): 127-129
Anime Episode(s): 77-79

videos.title: Tin Plate Wapol
videos.overview:
En route to Arabasta, Nami falls ill. Without a doctor aboard the Going Merry, the Straw Hats must decide whether to stay the course or find more immediate help. As their ship crosses into a frigid area, a figure is seen standing on the water's surface.

Manga Chapter(s): 129-132
Anime Episode(s): 78-79

videos.title: Adventure in a Nameless Country
videos.overview:
If the Straw Hats have any chance of saving Nami, they must carry her up a mountain to see the sole doctor of a nameless, winter island. While Sanji and Luffy fight off the wilderness, a despicable king makes an unwanted return.

Manga Chapter(s): 132-135
Anime Episode(s): 80-81

videos.title: The Summit
videos.overview:
A devastating avalanche sweeps Drum Island and puts everyone at risk, but Luffy—step-by-step, hand-over-hand—continues his death-defying ascent up the mountain. Meanwhile, Vivi, Usopp, and Zoro reunite in the wake of the disaster.

Manga Chapter(s): 136-139
Anime Episode(s): 82-83

videos.title: Enter: Tony Tony Chopper
videos.overview:
Enter Chopper: a talking, transforming blue-nosed reindeer who was trained by Dr. Kureha in medicine. The Straw Hats immediately see the positives and want him on their crew, but Chopper must first deal with the monstrous pain in his heart.

Manga Chapter(s): 139-140
Anime Episode(s): 83-84

videos.title: Quack Doctor
videos.overview:
Chopper began life as an ordinary reindeer but was shunned by his own kind because of his unusual blue nose. Even after eating the Human-Human Devil Fruit, the islanders wanted nothing to do with him. That is, until Chopper met a certain quack doctor.

Manga Chapter(s): 140-145
Anime Episode(s): 85-86

videos.title: Unbreakable
videos.overview:
Wapol and his comrades reach the mountaintop castle to wrest control of it back from Dr. Kureha and Chopper. Luffy, Sanji, and Chopper go head-to-head against his Munch-Munch powers, vowing to keep Wapol and his men from bringing down Hiriluk's flag.

Manga Chapter(s): 145-148
Anime Episode(s): 83, 86-88

videos.title: The Skies of Drum
videos.overview:
Chopper counters the combined Chessmarimo with an item that expands his zoan fruit abilities. Wapol slips away into his old castle, but Luffy runs after him to force a final showdown.

Manga Chapter(s): 149-152
Anime Episode(s): 88-90

videos.title: Hiriluk's Cherry Blossoms
videos.overview:
Finally convinced to join the Straw Hat Pirates, Chopper announces his intentions to Dr. Kureha. While she doesn't receive the news well at first, she decides to give the Straw Hats a fond parting gift while they exit the island.

Manga Chapter(s): 153-156
Anime Episode(s): 90-91

videos.title: Sir Crocodile, the Pirate
videos.overview:
In Arabasta, the hero Crocodile appears and puts a decisive end to a pillaging band of pirates. Meanwhile, Mr. 2 Bon Kurei pays a visit to the newly arrived Straw Hats. When he puts his abilities on display, Vivi notices something shocking.

Manga Chapter(s): 155-157
Anime Episode(s): 92

videos.title: Landfall in Alabasta
videos.overview:
The Merry makes landfall at Arabasta's port town, and while the rest of the Straw Hats wisely don disguises, Luffy runs afoul of an old foe. However, a chance reunion with a flame-wielding member of Luffy's family might just be the saving grace he needs!

Manga Chapter(s): 157-159
Anime Episode(s): 93-95

videos.title: Adventure in the Kingdom of Sand
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats finally start their arduous trek across the deserts of Arabasta! Along the way, they encounter martial-arts-loving dugongs, avian con artists, a giant carnivorous reptile, and a camel with very particular tastes in his passengers.

Manga Chapter(s): 159, 161-162
Anime Episode(s): 96-98

videos.title: Yuba, the Town of Rebels
videos.overview:
Vivi and co. finally reach Yuba, the last known location of the Rebel Army, but there is nary a soul in sight. Meanwhile, at the behest of their hidden leader, Baroque Works' officer agents begin to gather at the Spiders Cafe.

Manga Chapter(s): 159-164
Anime Episode(s): 98, 100-101, 103

videos.title: I Love My Country
videos.overview:
At Rain Dinners, the Baroque Works officer agents are finally let on to Mr. 0's true identity. And just outside Yuba, Luffy confronts a stubborn Vivi to remind her who else is willing to stand with her.

Manga Chapter(s): 164-166
Anime Episode(s): 100, 103-104

videos.title: Rainbase, the City of Dreams
videos.overview:
Luffy's band reaches the city of Rainbase but encounter Smoker and Tashigi. As they defend themselves against both the Marines and Baroque Works' millions, Luffy's party storms Crocodile's Rain Dinners Casino.

Manga Chapter(s): 167-168
Anime Episode(s): 105

videos.title: It Begins
videos.overview:
Luffy leads a daring—but foolish—raid on Crocodile's casino. His poor planning lands him behind bars with Captain Smoker. But more importantly, these actions leave Vivi alone and unprotected.

Manga Chapter(s): 169-170
Anime Episode(s): 106

videos.title: Rebellion
videos.overview:
"The king of Arabasta" appears to order Nanohana's attack. With this, the people's anger explodes! Meanwhile, Vivi frantically looks for Sanji, and as Crocodile leaves the pirates to their fate, he is suddenly contacted by a "Mr. Prince."

Manga Chapter(s): 171-174
Anime Episode(s): 107-108

videos.title: Rush!!
videos.overview:
Thanks to Sanji's brave actions, the Straw Hats made their escape, and Captain Smoker graciously looks the other way as they flee. However, as they set out toward Alubarna, Crocodile waylays Luffy, and the two begin a vicious duel.

Manga Chapter(s): 175-178
Anime Episode(s): 109-110

videos.title: Showdown at Alubarna
videos.overview:
Vivi's party speeds along toward Alubarna, as does the Rebel Army. While the Supersonic Duck Squad helps Zoro and the others play decoy, Vivi sets out on her own to try and stop Koza and his rebels.

Manga Chapter(s): 179-182
Anime Episode(s): 111-112

videos.title: Molehill Zone Four
videos.overview:
Despite his severe injuries, Karoo picks up Vivi to flee the attacks of Mr. 2, and they dash madly through the battlefield. And at the southeast gate: Chopper and Usopp vs. Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas!

Manga Chapter(s): 183-186
Anime Episode(s): 113-114

videos.title: Okama Kenpo
videos.overview:
Usopp and Chopper combine their skills to finish off Mr. 4 and Miss Merry Christmas, and Sanji engages Mr. 2 in a vicious foot-to-foot struggle. Meanwhile, as a last-ditch effort to save her people, Princess Vivi gives Chaka an unprecedented order.

Manga Chapter(s): 187-189
Anime Episode(s): 115-116

videos.title: She Who Controls the Weather
videos.overview:
Nami combats Miss Doublefinger, whose Spike-Spike powers quickly turn their brawl into a losing battle. That is, until Usopp's invention, the Climate Baton, gives Nami a fighting chance. And at the palace, Crocodile reveals his ultimate goal.

Manga Chapter(s): 189-192
Anime Episode(s): 113, 116-118

videos.title: Cutting Steel
videos.overview:
Crocodile reveals he seeks the mysterious Pluton, Nami has one last chance to stop Miss Doublefinger, and Zoro struggles against Mr. 1. As Zoro confronts certain death, he must remember something his sensei once imparted.

Manga Chapter(s): 192-195
Anime Episode(s): 118-119

videos.title: The Leaders
videos.overview:
Vivi reveals Crocodile's heinous plan to Koza. To stop the fighting, Koza raises the white flag but is suddenly shot. To induce even more panic, Crocodile announces that a massive bomb will be launched into the city, and he drops Vivi to her doom.

Manga Chapter(s): 196-198
Anime Episode(s): 120-121

videos.title: HOPE!!
videos.overview:
Luffy vs. Crocodile: Round 2! Luffy has discovered Crocodile's weakness, but the power of the Sand-Sand Fruit is devastating regardless. Meanwhile, the remaining Straw Hats have ten minutes to find a hidden cannoneer before a bomb is launched into the city.

Manga Chapter(s): 199-201
Anime Episode(s): 121-122

videos.title: Croc-ish
videos.overview:
Luffy and Crocodile enter the third phase of their duel, and, without water at his disposal, Luffy is forced to improvise. Back on the surface, Vivi uses her knowledge of the city to finally pinpoint the location of the bomb's cannoneer.

Manga Chapter(s): 202-205
Anime Episode(s): 123-124

videos.title: I Will Defeat You
videos.overview:
Vivi finds the cannon but realizes the bomb can't be stopped so casually. Then Pell swoops in with a decisive, if tragic, solution. The final battle between Luffy and Crocodile, which has both parties driven to their utmost, reaches its conclusion.

Manga Chapter(s): 206-210
Anime Episode(s): 125-126

videos.title: Some Justice
videos.overview:
Igaram appears with proof of Cobra's innocence, and Koza tells the people the truth behind the war. Luffy and his crew are brought into Cobra's palace to rest, and, during this time, Igaram receives word that there are new bounties making the rounds!

Manga Chapter(s): 211-213
Anime Episode(s): 127-128

videos.title: Vivi's Adventure
videos.overview:
As the Straw Hats make their escape from Arabasta, Bon Kurei and his men serve to distract Black Cage Hina of the Marines. Meanwhile, Vivi must make a speech, but, more importantly, she must decide whether to stay with the Straw Hats.

Manga Chapter(s): 214-216
Anime Episode(s): 128-129

videos.title: Stowaway
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats have evaded the Marines, but a new development crops up when a certain stowaway makes her presence on the Going Merry known... and she wants to be part of the crew!

Manga Chapter(s): 217-218
Anime Episode(s): 130

videos.title: Why the Log Pose Is Spherical
videos.overview:
When a galleon-size ship falls from the sky and Nami's log pose begins to point straight up, the Straw Hats sense a new adventure on the horizon. Right after a mysterious map is pulled from the wreckage, a group of salvagers come to claim the fallen ship.

Manga Chapter(s): 218-220
Anime Episode(s): 143-144

videos.title: Never Dream
videos.overview:
Mock Town on western Jaya openly welcomes pirates, but that fact is accompanied by constant danger. While asking about the sky island, Luffy and Zoro have a run-in with the loud pirate Bellamy the Hyena who ridicules their dreams.

Manga Chapter(s): 221-224
Anime Episode(s): 145-146

videos.title: People's Dreams
videos.overview:
After a one-sided brawl with Bellamy, the Straw Hats meet a black-haired pirate outside the bar who reaffirms their dreams and insists the sky island is real. As they depart for the other side of Jaya, another salvager of the Saruyama Alliance appears.

Manga Chapter(s): 225-226
Anime Episode(s): 147

videos.title: Noland the Liar
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats meet Montblanc Cricket, whose descendant was none other than Montblanc Noland, an infamous "liar" who told of a city of gold on Jaya. Cast out for looking for artifacts from the fabled city, he may just know a way to get to Skypiea.

Manga Chapter(s): 227-228
Anime Episode(s): 148

videos.title: Let's Eat
videos.overview:
Cricket explains how the Straw Hats can ride a dangerous vertical sea current to get to Skypiea. However, they must first catch a south bird to steer them toward the point where the stream will erupt from the ocean.

Manga Chapter(s): 229-230
Anime Episode(s): 149

videos.title: The Hundred Million Man
videos.overview:
While the Straw Hats are in the forest attempting to catch a south bird, Bellamy and his crew attack Masira, Shoujou, and Cricket and steal every gold artifact they had collected over the years from the salvage work of the Saruyama Alliance.

Manga Chapter(s): 231-232
Anime Episode(s): 150

videos.title: The Highest Authority in the World
videos.overview:
The duel between Bellamy and Luffy shocks all who look on. More shocking are the movements of fearsome pirates on the Grand Line and the machinations of the Blackbeard Pirates, as their captain vies for a position as a Warlord.

Manga Chapter(s): 232-234
Anime Episode(s): 145, 151

videos.title: The Knock-Up Stream
videos.overview:
Luffy returns victorious from his showdown with Bellamy, and the Going Merry has been refit by the Saruyama Alliance to handle its upcoming upward flight. The Straw Hats follow their captive south bird and steel themselves for their journey to the sky.

Manga Chapter(s): 235-236
Anime Episode(s): 152

videos.title: Heaven's Gate
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats, having used the Knock-Up Stream to fly into the sky, arrive on a white ocean above the clouds. While they marvel at the otherworldly sights, they are attacked by a powerful masked figure, and a mysterious flying knight comes to their aid.

Manga Chapter(s): 237-238
Anime Episode(s): 153

videos.title: Angel Beach
videos.overview:
After bidding farewell to Gan Fall and passing through the gate to Skypiea, the pirates encounter a family of Skypieans: Conis and her father, Pagaya. The two explain the workings of life in the sky and introduce the crew to the different dials.

Manga Chapter(s): 239-240
Anime Episode(s): 154

videos.title: Divine Reckoning
videos.overview:
Nami takes the waver out for a test ride and discovers the forbidden Upper Yard. Meanwhile, law enforcement arrives and rudely harasses the rest of the gang.

Manga Chapter(s): 241-242
Anime Episode(s): 155-156

videos.title: Ordeal
videos.overview:
The pirates are fed up and ready to leave Skypiea, but Nami, Zoro, Robin, and Chopper are whisked away aboard the Merry. The remaining Straw Hat Pirates must face Enel's challenge, so Conis shows them the way to Upper Yard.

Manga Chapter(s): 243-244
Anime Episode(s): 157-158

videos.title: Adventure on God's Island
videos.overview:
Aboard the Little Crow, Luffy, Usopp, and Sanji enter Upper Yard and must choose an ordeal. Meanwhile, Zoro and co. have their own troubles at the Sacrificial Altar. When they leave to explore the forest, Chopper is left to repair the Merry.

Manga Chapter(s): 245-246
Anime Episode(s): 159-160

videos.title: The Village Hidden in the Clouds
videos.overview:
Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp are locked in a life-or-death struggle against the Priest Satori. It's all they can do to withstand the random attributes of Satori's strange spheres and to overcome the power of mantra, which can seemingly predict their movements.

Manga Chapter(s): 247-249
Anime Episode(s): 161-163

videos.title: Overture
videos.overview:
Gan Fall is severely burned during his battle with Shura, and Chopper musters the courage for a leap of faith. Elsewhere, Luffy and co. finally discover a way to defeat the mantra-wielding Satori, and the Shandians prepare for an all-out attack on God!

Manga Chapter(s): 250-251
Anime Episode(s): 163-164

videos.title: Vearth
videos.overview:
The Shandians' attack on Upper Yard commences! At the Sacrificial Altar, the crew is finally reunited, and everyone recounts what has happened. Chopper looks after the injured Gan Fall, and the pirates devise a plan to steal the gold on the island.

Manga Chapter(s): 252-254
Anime Episode(s): 165-167

videos.title: Dial Battle
videos.overview:
The crew splits up into Nami's escape team and Luffy's exploration team. Unfortunately, a giant snake attacks and separates Luffy's team. To top it all off, the Priests have set up their ordeals across the whole island.

Manga Chapter(s): 255-257
Anime Episode(s): 168-169

videos.title: Pirate Luffy vs. Berserker Wyper
videos.overview:
Only 80 remain in the Upper Yard survival game. Zoro finds himself face-to-face with the Shandian Braham, Luffy takes on Wyper and his burning bazooka, and Nami's group on the Merry has the deadliest encounter of all!

Manga Chapter(s): 258-260
Anime Episode(s): 170-171

videos.title: Pirate Chopper vs. Priest Gedatsu
videos.overview:
Luffy's fight with Wyper lands him in a dark cavern filled with ruins, Enel leaves a deadly pair of new enemies to deal with Nami and Gan Fall, and Chopper comes face to face with Sky Punk Gedatsu.

Manga Chapter(s): 261-263
Anime Episode(s): 171-173

videos.title: Pirate Robin vs. Commander Yama
videos.overview:
Enel wipes out several fighters regardless of their allegiance. An hour remains until God's deadline, and only twenty-four survivors remain. Meanwhile, after a deadly struggle with the rotund Yama, Robin makes the discovery of a lifetime.

Manga Chapter(s): 264-266, 268
Anime Episode(s): 172-174

videos.title: Concerto
videos.overview:
While Luffy remains lost in a strange, dark cavern, at the Upper Ruins, Priest Ohm confronts Zoro, Gan Fall, and Wyper with his Ordeal of Iron. As the fight wears on, Shandian warriors, Nami, and Aisa make a sudden appearance.

Manga Chapter(s): 266-269
Anime Episode(s): 175-176

videos.title: Pirate Zoro vs. Priest Ohm
videos.overview:
After being swallowed by the giant snake, Nami, Gan Fall, and Aisa meet someone they never expected would be in the serpent's stomach. As Priest Ohm's Ordeal of Iron comes to a close in the Upper Ruins, Zoro unleashes a powerful new technique.

Manga Chapter(s): 270-273
Anime Episode(s): 177-179

videos.title: Quintet
videos.overview:
The lost ruins of Shandora are revealed in a spectacle of lightning, and the remaining survivors of Enel's twisted game begin their showdown with the self-styled deity. As the group faces him, "God" reveals his ultimate goal...

Manga Chapter(s): 273-276
Anime Episode(s): 179-181

videos.title: Conis
videos.overview:
God Enel reveals his grand masterpiece to the sole survivor of his deadly game, and a certain rubber man finally frees himself of the snake's stomach! Meanwhile, Conis makes a desperate dash to Angel Island to warn its residents of their impending doom.

Manga Chapter(s): 277-279
Anime Episode(s): 181-182

videos.title: Deathpiea
videos.overview:
As the citizens of the sky run for their lives, Enel activates Deathpiea! Luffy must discover a way to lay hands on the heinous holy man before he's sent overboard, and Sanji and Usopp mount a midair rescue mission.

Manga Chapter(s): 280-283
Anime Episode(s): 183-185

videos.title: On the Front Line of Love's Salvation
videos.overview:
Usopp arrives just in time to save Nami from a lethal thunderbolt, and Sanji stealthily searches for a way to sabotage the ark. Despite being slowed by an arm encased in gold, Luffy races up Giant Jack on a mission to settle the score!

Manga Chapter(s): 283-286
Anime Episode(s): 185-186

videos.title: Godkiller
videos.overview:
As Enel rains destruction upon Skypiea, Wyper remembers the tales passed down by the village elder about when his ancestor the warrior Kalgara met the explorer Mont Blanc Noland.

Manga Chapter(s): 286-289
Anime Episode(s): 187-188

videos.title: The Light of Shandora
videos.overview:
The flashback of the legend of Mont Blanc Noland and Kalgara the warrior continues with the story of how these two very different men suddenly found friendship... and then lost it just as quickly!

Manga Chapter(s): 290-291
Anime Episode(s): 188

videos.title: Raigō
videos.overview:
Mont Blanc Noland's tale ends in tragedy and misunderstanding. In the present, Enel strikes Angel Island with a devastating lightning bolt, and Luffy refuses to halt his climb up the beanstalk until he rings the golden bell!

Manga Chapter(s): 292-295
Anime Episode(s): 189-190

videos.title: Love Song
videos.overview:
While Enel continues his thunderous barrage, Nami hatches a plan to give Luffy one more shot at a grudge match with God. With a nudge from Zoro, Wyper, and a snake, Straw Hat launches himself into the center of a sinister storm!

Manga Chapter(s): 295-298
Anime Episode(s): 191-192

videos.title: Fantasia
videos.overview:
In the aftermath of Luffy's epic battle with Enel, sunny skies chase away the storms, and the cloud-dwelling citizens of Angel Island turn their attention to rebuilding their homeland.

Manga Chapter(s): 299-300
Anime Episode(s): 193

videos.title: I Made It Here
videos.overview:
Robin deciphers the message of the poneglyph, ending the Shandians' centuries-long task of guarding the golden bell. Before leaving Skypiea, the Straw Hats embark on their promised gold heist, and the people of the sky see them off on their journey.

Manga Chapter(s): 301
Anime Episode(s): 194

videos.title: Finale
videos.overview:
With a little help from their new friends—and a giant octopus—the Straw Hats bid farewell to Skypiea and begin their descent back to the Blue Sea. Then as night falls, a certain Warlord makes an appearance at Jaya...

Manga Chapter(s): 302-303
Anime Episode(s): 195, 203, 207

videos.title: The Wealthy Pirate Gang
videos.overview:
Manga Chapter(s): 303
Anime Episode(s): 207, 225

videos.title: Adventure on a Long Island
videos.overview:
As they continue to traverse the Grand Line, the Straw Hats pass a ship with no sails, no Jolly Roger, and no captain. After an encounter with giant sea monkeys, they come upon an island where everything is much longer than usual.

Manga Chapter(s): 304-306
Anime Episode(s): 207-209

videos.title: Donut Race!!
videos.overview:
Luffy accepts Foxy's challenge to a Davy Back Fight, a pirate contest in which the stakes are the crews themselves! Round #1 is the Donut Race, where each team races around the island in tiny boats made from just the scraps of three barrels.

Manga Chapter(s): 307-309
Anime Episode(s): 209-210

videos.title: Groggy Ring!!
videos.overview:
Unexpected interference from Foxy himself cost the Straw Hats more than they bargained for. Now, in a struggle against literal monsters, the unlikely duo of Sanji and Zoro must win round #2, the Groggy Ring.

Manga Chapter(s): 310-312
Anime Episode(s): 211-212

videos.title: Combat
videos.overview:
The two captains face off in a final game: a battle of brawn aboard Foxy's ship in round #3, Combat! Luffy, sporting a killer afro and an attitude to match, steps into the boxing ring to put the hurt on Foxy.

Manga Chapter(s): 313-316
Anime Episode(s): 212, 215, 217-218

videos.title: K.O.
videos.overview:
The final round of the Davy Back Fight rages on, and atop the deck of Foxy's ship, the epic battle nears its climax. During the fight, Luffy makes a surprise discovery about Foxy's powers that he keeps strategically hidden.

Manga Chapter(s): 317-318
Anime Episode(s): 219, 226

videos.title: Marine HQ Admiral Aokiji
videos.overview:
Only three officers in all the Marines hold the position of admiral, literal powerhouses of the World Government. The icy Aokiji, one such admiral, catches up with the Straw Hats, but Luffy is not the one he is after.

Manga Chapter(s): 319-321
Anime Episode(s): 227-228

videos.title: The City of Water, Water Seven
videos.overview:
The keepers of Shift Station, Kokoro and her granddaughter Chimney, point the Straw Hats in the direction of the metropolitan Water Seven. The nearby city is regarded as the best place to find a decent shipwright for the Going Merry.

Manga Chapter(s): 322-324
Anime Episode(s): 228-230

videos.title: Mr. Iceburg
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats cash in their Skypiean gold and meet up with Iceburg, the celebrity mayor of Water Seven, to see about an appraisal for their ship's repairs. While the foreman Kaku checks the Merry, dubious people eye the pirates' money.

Manga Chapter(s): 324-326
Anime Episode(s): 229-231

videos.title: The Case of the Kidnapped Pirate
videos.overview:
Kalifa shows Luffy and co. around Dock One and tells them about Iceburg and Galley-La Company. During the tour, Kaku returns with some bad news, and a long-nosed Straw Hat goes missing... along with the money he was watching!

Manga Chapter(s): 326-329
Anime Episode(s): 232-234

videos.title: Impasse
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats raid the Franky House, but they soon find that their real target, Franky, is long gone with the stolen money. When the battered Usopp awakens, nothing can prepare him to hear what Luffy has decided about the Merry.

Manga Chapter(s): 330-332
Anime Episode(s): 234-235

videos.title: Luffy vs. Usopp
videos.overview:
Usopp is unwilling to say farewell to the Going Merry... not without a fight, that is! He challenges his former captain to a duel between men, so Luffy honors the pride of his former crewmate and faces him in battle.

Manga Chapter(s): 332-333
Anime Episode(s): 235-236

videos.title: Warning
videos.overview:
Iceburg has been shot! When Luffy and Nami decide to go check on him, the fire-breathing, half-mechanical Franky challenges the Straw Hats' captain. Before their fight gets too heated, Galley-La swoops in with an unexpected accusation!

Manga Chapter(s): 334-337
Anime Episode(s): 237-239

videos.title: Rumors
videos.overview:
Things are hectic enough with Franky going after Luffy, but now the Straw Hats are being framed for a crime seemingly committed by Nico Robin. As if to put the proverbial icing on the cake, the annual storm Aqua Laguna is on its way toward Water Seven.

Manga Chapter(s): 338-339
Anime Episode(s): 239-240

videos.title: Devil
videos.overview:
Nico Robin appears to be working alongside a World Government shadow organization called CP9. When the Straw Hats learn about Robin's current affiliation, Luffy decides that in order to know the full truth, they must catch Robin and make her talk.

Manga Chapter(s): 340-342
Anime Episode(s): 240-241

videos.title: Cipher Pol No. 9
videos.overview:
Robin and her tall, mysterious, masked companion arrive at Iceburg's room, and she learns that he possesses blueprints to the ancient weapon Pluton, spoken of in the poneglyphs. Then, shockingly, the members of CP9 unmask themselves.

Manga Chapter(s): 342-345
Anime Episode(s): 242-243

videos.title: Six Powers
videos.overview:
Luffy's group finally catches up to Robin, but they are greeted by disappointment—Robin opts to stay with CP9 and leave the Straw Hats. As Robin turns away from Luffy, the members of CP9 confronts the pirates.

Manga Chapter(s): 346-348
Anime Episode(s): 244-246

videos.title: Klabautermann
videos.overview:
As Usopp works to repair the Going Merry, he contends with Franky's insistence on dismantling it. During this time, Usopp reflects on who it was that conducted the ship's repairs while in Skypiea, and Franky confirms his suspicions.

Manga Chapter(s): 349-352
Anime Episode(s): 246-248

videos.title: The Legendary Shipwright
videos.overview:
In the past, Franky—a.k.a. Cutty Flam—was part of the legendary Tom's Workers, and he and Iceburg helped create the sea train. Spandam, a member of CP5, was determined to get Tom's blueprints for Pluton by any means necessary.

Manga Chapter(s): 353-355
Anime Episode(s): 248-249

videos.title: Mr. Tom
videos.overview:
The old fishman Tom was framed by CP5 for the crime of attacking the Marines with Franky's battleships. As the World Government hauled Tom off to Enies Lobby, Franky received a lasting reminder to take pride in the ships he builds.

Manga Chapter(s): 355-357
Anime Episode(s): 249-250

videos.title: Bingo
videos.overview:
CP9 hauls away Franky and Usopp, but not before giving a coldhearted farewell to the Merry. At Galley-La's HQ, Nami learns from Iceburg the truth behind Robin's betrayal and the difficult choice she had to make to save the lives of the Straw Hats.

Manga Chapter(s): 358-359
Anime Episode(s): 250-251, 256, 320

videos.title: Departing Shortly
videos.overview:
While the members of Galley-La help Chopper search for Luffy and Zoro, Nami rushes to the departing sea train to keep Robin from sacrificing her freedom. At the station, a man finds Nami and hands her a letter from Sanji.

Manga Chapter(s): 360-362
Anime Episode(s): 252-254

videos.title: Aqua Laguna
videos.overview:
Sanji coolly fights his way through the sea train and locates Usopp and Franky. Back in Water Seven, Kokoro sees how determined Luffy is to save Robin, so she and Iceburg lend the Straw Hat crew an unexpected helping hand.

Manga Chapter(s): 363-365
Anime Episode(s): 254-255

videos.title: Sogeking
videos.overview:
Rocketman blasts out of Water Seven and connects with the sea tracks, and old foes become allies for the coming struggle. Aqua Laguna swells, and it's up to Luffy and Zoro to combine their might and create safe passage for all aboard.

Manga Chapter(s): 366-367
Anime Episode(s): 256-257

videos.title: Ramen Kenpo
videos.overview:
Sogeking appears in grand fashion! Wanze threatens Sanji's group with his ramen kenpo, so the Straw Hat cook urges the others ahead. Franky takes on CP9's newest recruit "Sea Weasel" Nero, and Sogeking moves forward to meet up with Robin.

Manga Chapter(s): 368-369
Anime Episode(s): 258-259

videos.title: The Honorable Captain T-Bone
videos.overview:
In his battle against Wanze and his strange Ramen Kenpo, Sanji makes an exception to his rule of never using his hands. Meanwhile, Franky and Nero are baffled by each other's abilities, and back on Rocketman, Zoro clashes with "Ship-Slasher" T-Bone.

Manga Chapter(s): 370-371
Anime Episode(s): 259-261

videos.title: Necessary Evil
videos.overview:
Sanji and Franky conclude their fights and enter the train car where CP9's agents lie in wait. When Sogeking sees the danger of the situation, it falls to him to formulate a plan for escape. However, CP9 is far from being thwarted!

Manga Chapter(s): 372-374
Anime Episode(s): 262-263

videos.title: The Superhumans of Enies Lobby
videos.overview:
As the Straw Hats and their allies approach Enies Lobby on Rocketman, they hatch a plan to save Robin before she passes through the Gates of Justice. Meanwhile, Spandam holds a meeting with CP9 where they await Lucci's return in the Tower of Justice.

Manga Chapter(s): 375-376
Anime Episode(s): 263-264

videos.title: The Big Showdown on the Judiciary Island!!
videos.overview:
Luffy launches a one-man assault on Enies Lobby, and the rest of his allies work to break the first gate's defenses. What awaits Galley-La and the Franky Family at the second gate is a showdown of massive proportions!

Manga Chapter(s): 376-378
Anime Episode(s): 265-266

videos.title: Express to the Main Island of Enies Lobby
videos.overview:
Robin and Franky are finally brought before Spandam while Luffy continues to blast through waves of marines. Galley-La and the Franky Family still have one giant to deal with, and the main gate closes to halt Rocketman's entry.

Manga Chapter(s): 379-380
Anime Episode(s): 266-267

videos.title: Fired
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats struggle to catch up to Luffy, who is already on the main island wreaking havoc for the Marines. Meanwhile, Robin learns from Spandam that the terms of their deal have changed, and he somehow has rights to a buster call.

Manga Chapter(s): 381-382
Anime Episode(s): 268-269

videos.title: Raise the Counterattack Signal
videos.overview:
Luffy makes it just outside the courthouse when Blueno of CP9 appears before him, and on the main road, the Straw Hats near the courthouse plaza aboard Sodom and Gomorrah. Meanwhile, Sogeking comes across a dejected Oimo.

Manga Chapter(s): 383-384
Anime Episode(s): 269-271

videos.title: Unprecedented
videos.overview:
Kaku and Kalifa of CP9 are offered a rare chance for new powers and are each served a devil fruit. The Straw Hats finally arrive at the courthouse plaza when Spandam receives an urgent call, and he realizes things are much worse than previously reported.

Manga Chapter(s): 385-387
Anime Episode(s): 271-273

videos.title: Gear Second
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats storm the courthouse where the three-headed judge Baskerville awaits to enact violent judgment upon them. On the roof, Luffy thanks CP9's Blueno for the strength of his opponents, and he activates a new ability.

Manga Chapter(s): 388-390
Anime Episode(s): 273-274

videos.title: The Girl They Called a Devil
videos.overview:
Twenty years ago, Nico Robin grew up on Ohara in the West Blue, striving to become an archaeologist like her mother. When Robin met Saul, a giant who washed onto the shores of Ohara, her life would forever be changed.

Manga Chapter(s): 391-393
Anime Episode(s): 275-276

videos.title: Ohara vs. The World Government
videos.overview:
Robin's mother Olvia was on the run from the World Government, and tragedy was unavoidable from the moment Professor Clover and his colleagues decided to continue their research. No one on Ohara was safe.

Manga Chapter(s): 394-396
Anime Episode(s): 276-277

videos.title: Declaration of War
videos.overview:
To prove his undying loyalty to Robin, Luffy makes a defiant statement to the World Government.

Manga Chapter(s): 397-398
Anime Episode(s): 278

videos.title: Jump into the Waterfall!!
videos.overview:
Franky stages his own rebellious act against Spandam while Luffy's crew makes a daring leap of faith to hopefully gain entrance to the Tower of Justice.

Manga Chapter(s): 399-400
Anime Episode(s): 284-285

videos.title: Pirates vs. CP9
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats split up to find the correct key before Robin's fate is sealed. Zoro finds and engages Kaku in battle, and Sogeking attempts to steal a key from the sleeping Jabra.

Manga Chapter(s): 401-402
Anime Episode(s): 286-287

videos.title: Mr. Chivalry
videos.overview:
Sanji faces his greatest weakness: fighting a beautiful woman! Meanwhile, Franky begins to run low on cola energy, but he must battle the peculiar Fukuro to obtain more of his refreshing fuel from the kitchen.

Manga Chapter(s): 403-404
Anime Episode(s): 287-288

videos.title: Vitality Response
videos.overview:
Refreshed and refueled, Franky turns the tide in his battle with Fukuro. Meanwhile, Zoro and Sogeking must find a way to compensate for their self-imposed handicap, and Chopper unfortunately comes face-to-face with Kumadori.

Manga Chapter(s): 405-406
Anime Episode(s): 289-290

videos.title: Monster
videos.overview:
Chopper's abuse of his rumble balls results in a monstrous side effect. In the meantime, Nami learns how Kalifa's new devil fruit powers sapped Sanji of his strength, and a determined Luffy finally catches up to Spandam, Lucci and Robin.

Manga Chapter(s): 407-408
Anime Episode(s): 290, 293

videos.title: The Terrifying Emergency Broadcast
videos.overview:
As the Marines eke out a comeback against the Straw Hats' allies, Spandam makes the call Robin most dreaded. In the meantime, Lucci and Luffy begin their mutually anticipated duel, while Nami and Kalifa's fight enters the next phase.

Manga Chapter(s): 409-411
Anime Episode(s): 294-295

videos.title: The Hunter
videos.overview:
Kalifa attempts to counter Nami's mirages, and something must be done to save Chopper, still on a monstrous rampage. Zoro, now uncuffed, resumes his duel with Kaku. As Sogeking reaches his limit against Jabra, Sanji reappears, and he is hunting wolves.

Manga Chapter(s): 412-413
Anime Episode(s): 296-297

videos.title: Sanji vs. Jabra
videos.overview:
As Nami drags the wounded Sogeking from the fight to go find Robin, he suddenly counters with a better idea. In the meantime, Sanji faces off against Jabra's Iron Body Kenpo, and, to break the latter's defenses, Sanji unveils his latest technique.

Manga Chapter(s): 414-415
Anime Episode(s): 297-298

videos.title: Zoro vs. Kaku
videos.overview:
Spandam drags Robin along the Bridge of Hesitation and finally arrives at the Gates of Justice. Meanwhile, Zoro continues his clash with Kaku, and as things become more desperate, Zoro's rage begins to manifest as a dark aura.

Manga Chapter(s): 416-418
Anime Episode(s): 299-301

videos.title: Buster Call
videos.overview:
Luffy gives Franky the opening he needs to head for Robin. The cyborg runs into trouble at the start of the bridge, but all is not lost as a lone sniper appears atop the Tower of Justice. Despite these minor victories, the buster call commences.

Manga Chapter(s): 419-420
Anime Episode(s): 301-302

videos.title: Rob Lucci
videos.overview:
With time running out, Luffy activates another special ability. The vice admirals of the buster call are shocked to see Luffy taking on Rob Lucci and recall how the CP9 enforcer, even in his youth, held strongly to a dark sense of justice.

Manga Chapter(s): 421-422
Anime Episode(s): 302, 304-305

videos.title: The Legend of the Mermaid
videos.overview:
Lucci corners Luffy, weakened by his new ability's aftereffects. Back on the bridge, Spandam makes an attempt on Robin's life, so Franky jumps into action. Meanwhile, the rest of the gang is about to drown in the flooded passageway.

Manga Chapter(s): 423-424
Anime Episode(s): 306-307

videos.title: We're Not in Hell
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats watch as Enies Lobby burns, and Franky fears for his men when he hears of a successful attack against them. Luffy resumes his fight against Lucci while 200 Marine captains bear down on his crewmates.

Manga Chapter(s): 425-427
Anime Episode(s): 307-309

videos.title: Utter Defeat
videos.overview:
Luffy has finally defeated Rob Lucci, and good news arrives that the Franky Family and Galley-La foremen are all alive and well. As the Straw Hats scramble to escape the Marines, they hear a voice telling them to jump into the sea.

Manga Chapter(s): 428-429
Anime Episode(s): 310-311

videos.title: A Gentle Snowfall of Remembrance
videos.overview:
Enies Lobby and the buster call fleet are out of sight, but the Going Merry begins to break apart. The Straw Hats are intercepted by Iceburg aboard his company ship and discover how the Merry found her way back to them one last time.

Manga Chapter(s): 430
Anime Episode(s): 312

videos.title: The Strongest Family Lineage?! The Vice-Admiral and The Revolutionary!
videos.overview:
Two days later in Water Seven, Franky hears that the item for he purchased with the Straw Hats' stolen money has arrived. While the pirates recover from the events at Enies Lobby, a Marine vice admiral arrives to pay Luffy an unexpected visit.

Manga Chapter(s): 431-432
Anime Episode(s): 313-314

videos.title: The Extent of the Grand Line and The 600,000,000 Crew!
videos.overview:
In the New World, not even the Marines' best can keep Red-Haired Shanks from meeting Whitebeard with an especially important request. Meanwhile, at Water Seven, the Franky Family comes to the Straw Hats with some "bad" news.

Manga Chapter(s): 433-435
Anime Episode(s): 315-316, 319-320, 325

videos.title: Forgive Yourself! Franky Departs!
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats have barely had time to marvel at their new bounties when a new surprise awaits them: the unveiling of their magnificent new ship. The next step is bringing a shipwright into their ranks, and there is only one man for the job.

Manga Chapter(s): 436-437
Anime Episode(s): 321-322

videos.title: The Astonishing Thousand Sunny and Usopp's Tearful Apology!
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats set sail, but Usopp is conspicuously missing. Zoro soberly reminds Luffy that Usopp's return should not be granted so casually. More immediately, the pirates need to avoid Garp's barrage of cannon balls!

Manga Chapter(s): 438-439
Anime Episode(s): 323-324

videos.title: The Circling Bounties and The Duel on Banaro Island!
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats' new wanted posters begin circulating around the world, but three days earlier, Blackbeard began plotting their pursuit. However, one obstacle stood in his way; Ace had finally caught up to his estranged crewmate!

Manga Chapter(s): 440-441
Anime Episode(s): 324-325

videos.title: The Mysterious Sea and The Skeleton Brook!
videos.overview:
The Thousand Sunny gets flung into the foggy Florian Triangle and the Straw Hats encounter a ruined ship. Speculating as to whether there are ghosts aboard, it turns out the pirates are not far from the truth.

Manga Chapter(s): 442-443
Anime Episode(s): 326, 337-339

videos.title: Adventure on the Ghost Island and the Famous Doctor Hogback!
videos.overview:
Brook bids the Straw Hats farewell, and they decide to explore the nearby ghost island Thriller Bark. Freakish danger awaits the landing party the moment they arrive, and, back on the Sunny, the rest of the crew is harassed by an unseen foe.

Manga Chapter(s): 444-445
Anime Episode(s): 339-340

videos.title: The Invisible Man and the Secret of the Mansion!
videos.overview:
While staying at Hogback's eerie mansion, Nami is assaulted by an invisible figure in the shower. It does not end there as Usopp battles haunted paintings with a handful of candles. Meanwhile, the rest of the Straw Hats finally make landfall.

Manga Chapter(s): 446-448
Anime Episode(s): 340-342

videos.title: General Zombie Night! Thriller Bark's Mysterious Four
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats learn that the head honcho on the island is one of the Seven Warlords, and he has concocted a shadowy scheme. As Absalom rallies the zombies, the master of Thriller Bark awakens.

Manga Chapter(s): 449-450
Anime Episode(s): 342-344

videos.title: Perona's Wonder Garden and the Charge of the General Zombies!
videos.overview:
Nami, Usopp, and Chopper manage to escape their coffin but find themselves in a garden surrounded by animal zombies, including one acting remarkably like Sanji. It also seems that one by one, the Straw Hats are disappearing.

Manga Chapter(s): 451-452
Anime Episode(s): 345-346

videos.title: Number 900?! Lola's Pursuit and the Humming Swordsman
videos.overview:
Lola attacks Nami out of ignorant jealousy, but the Sanji-esque zombie plays interference. Meanwhile, with Luffy captured, and Franky and Robin left to face a massive spider monkey, a familiar bony figure falls from the sky.

Manga Chapter(s): 453-454
Anime Episode(s): 347-348

videos.title: The Fearsome Ability of the Shadow Fruit! The Ultimate Number 900!
videos.overview:
Gecko Moria takes his next step toward his goal of eventually becoming king of the pirates by creating the ultimate zombie. Luffy's shadow in hand, Moria begins the revival of the much-anticipated number 900.

Manga Chapter(s): 455-456
Anime Episode(s): 349-350

videos.title: Oars' Awakening and Brook vs. Ryuma!
videos.overview:
Dead for 500 years and left in a deep freeze since, Oars awakens, fueled by Luffy's shadow. Soon after, Nami, Usopp, and Chopper are discovered hiding inside Perona's pet bear, and Absalom abducts Nami for his demented marriage ceremony.

Manga Chapter(s): 457-458
Anime Episode(s): 351-353

videos.title: The Hope and Despair of the Skeleton and the Straw Hats' Counterattack!
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats regroup on the Sunny in a pitiable state, but not before Brook leaves Franky with some valuable information. In addition, they now know of the promise Brook made to a certain friend fifty years ago, someone the Straw Hats know well.

Manga Chapter(s): 459-460
Anime Episode(s): 353-355

videos.title: Already Negative! Usopp's Courageous Stand!
videos.overview:
Oars' entry into the fight suddenly changes everything! Then, when Perona attacks, only one of the pirates seems to be immune to her negative powers. Due to his glass-half-empty personality, Usopp might have what it takes to defeat the Ghost Princess.

Manga Chapter(s): 461-462
Anime Episode(s): 356-357

videos.title: A Stolen Dream! Sanji vs. Absalom
videos.overview:
Sanji crashes Absalom's sham of a wedding, the fire in his heart burning brightly as he rescues Nami. A curious connection between Sanji and the Clear-Clear Fruit is revealed, and he vows to defeat Absalom for ruining his lifelong dream.

Manga Chapter(s): 463-464
Anime Episode(s): 357-359

videos.title: Perona's Terror! Usopp vs. the Ghost Princess!
videos.overview:
After getting the stuffing beat out of him by a zombie teddy bear, Usopp summons his sharp-shooting alter ego to help him discover the secret to defeating Perona! He reaches deep into his devious bag of tricks to even the odds in this spooky battle.

Manga Chapter(s): 465-466
Anime Episode(s): 360-362

videos.title: Zoro vs. Ryuuma and Chopper's Rage!
videos.overview:
Zoro stands in for Brook and duels Ryuma, the swordsman zombie from faraway Wano. In the mansion, Chopper's former respect for Dr. Hogback is completely erased after coming to realize the man's twisted views on life.

Manga Chapter(s): 467-468
Anime Episode(s): 362-363

videos.title: Show Yourselves, Straw Hat Pirates! The Crew's Hopeless Counterattack!
videos.overview:
With Oars now a fully obedient zombie, Gecko Moria takes his leave while instructing the giant to hunt down the pirates, whose wanted posters are sewn onto his arm. One by one, the Straw Hats' battles are interrupted by Oars' march around Thriller Bark.

Manga Chapter(s): 469-470
Anime Episode(s): 364-365

videos.title: Clash! The Titanic Battle Against Zombie 900!
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats sans Luffy are faced with the insurmountable task of taking out Oars. To knock him down, Franky decides they will need to use his newly developed tactic. But as they begin "docking" onto one another, a slight problem arises.

Manga Chapter(s): 471-472
Anime Episode(s): 365-367

videos.title: The Mysterious Visitor! The Two Warlords Meet!
videos.overview:
While the Straw Hats continue to wear away at Oars, Nami confronts Perona attempting to escape on board the Thousand Sunny, but the sudden appearance of a large, mysterious figure soon makes her efforts moot.

Manga Chapter(s): 473-474
Anime Episode(s): 368-369

videos.title: Combination of Brains and Brawn! Oars and Moriah vs. the Straw Hats!
videos.overview:
To give Luffy a fighting chance against Moria, Lola and her pirate crew propose a plan to fight shadow with shadow. Meanwhile, Gecko Moria uses his abilities to enhance and manipulate Oars' massive body.

Manga Chapter(s): 475-476
Anime Episode(s): 370-371

videos.title: The Crew's Annihilation! Oars vs. Nightmare Luffy
videos.overview:
Moria's strange combination with Oars defeats the Straw Hats one after the other. They are at their breaking point when a powerful figure swoops in and takes up the fight in their stead. The hellish creation: Nightmare Luffy!

Manga Chapter(s): 477-479
Anime Episode(s): 371-372

videos.title: Morning Comes! The Straw Hats' Ultimate Attack!
videos.overview:
Oars recovers from Nightmare Luffy's assault, but the Straw Hats all get back on their feet and launch a final devastating attack on Oars. Morning fast approaches, and Moria is far from finished, ready to use his ultimate technique.

Manga Chapter(s): 480-482
Anime Episode(s): 373-374

videos.title: The Power That Can Deflect Anything?! Zoro Fights Prepared to Die!
videos.overview:
Moria's defeat returns the shadows of all his victims. However, one Warlord remains on the island, and he has orders to terminate the Straw Hats and everyone else in the area. A lone Zoro faces Kuma in vain and is presented with a deadly choice.

Manga Chapter(s): 483-485
Anime Episode(s): 375-377

videos.title: Brook's Past! The Rumbar Pirates and Laboon!
videos.overview:
Brook recalls his past, thinking back on the time when the small whale Laboon started following his pirate ship and befriended the crew.

Manga Chapter(s): 486-487
Anime Episode(s): 378-380

videos.title: Brook's Promise! The Eighth Member
videos.overview:
At death's door, the Rumbar Pirates sang "Binks' Brew" one last time and recorded it in a tone dial, hoping to one day deliver it to Laboon. With their new crewmate and musician Brook on board, the Straw Hats bid farewell to Lola's crew.

Manga Chapter(s): 488-489
Anime Episode(s): 380-381

videos.title: Flying Fish Riders
videos.overview:
As the Straw Hats journey to Fishman Island, they reach the Red Line, the halfway point along the Grand Line. When a sea king appears, Luffy easily dispatches it, but it spits up a mermaid and a talking starfish onto the deck of the Sunny.

Manga Chapter(s): 490-491
Anime Episode(s): 385-386

videos.title: Iron Mask Duval
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats arrive at Duval's (eerily quiet) base and manage to locate Camie's captured friend. Realizing the captive's identity, the Straw Hats reluctantly agree to rescue him, and only in exchange for directions to Fishman Island.

Manga Chapter(s): 492-493
Anime Episode(s): 387-388

videos.title: Duval's Tragedy
videos.overview:
Blaming Sanji for his misfortunes, Duval swears vengeance on the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, the Flying Fish Riders attempt to sink the Sunny, but the ship is far from vulnerable. Finally, Sanji himself faces Duval in a bid to end things.

Manga Chapter(s): 494-495
Anime Episode(s): 388-389

videos.title: Adventure on the Archipelago of Dancing Soap Bubbles
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats make their way to Sabaody Archipelago to prepare the Sunny for its undersea voyage to Fishman Island. During their search for a coating mechanic, the Straw Hats encounter the Celestial Dragons, the cruel rulers of the World Government.

Manga Chapter(s): 496-497
Anime Episode(s): 390-391

videos.title: The Embers of History
videos.overview:
While at Shakky's Rip-off Bar, the Straw Hats learn that Luffy, Zoro and nine other rookie pirates on Sabaody have reached a certain level of infamy. Later, Zoro has a close call with an insufferable and sadistic Celestial Dragon.

Manga Chapter(s): 498-500
Anime Episode(s): 392-394

videos.title: The Auction House Incident
videos.overview:
Nami's group arrives at the Grove 1 auction house where Camie will be sold to the highest bidder. With 200 million berries in hand, Nami is determined to win back their friend. The auction wears on as Luffy and co. race to the grove.

Manga Chapter(s): 501-502
Anime Episode(s): 395-396

videos.title: An Island in Chaos
videos.overview:
As chaos erupts inside the auction house, a mysterious man with an equally mysterious power emerges from backstage. But now, due to Luffy's insolent actions, a Marine admiral is on his way to Sabaody.

Manga Chapter(s): 503-504
Anime Episode(s): 397-398

videos.title: Roger and Rayleigh
videos.overview:
The Marines surround the auction house, and super rookies Monkey D. Luffy, Eustass Kid, and Trafalgar Law all want a piece of the action. Later, Rayleigh reveals his shocking past to the Straw Hats.

Manga Chapter(s): 505-506
Anime Episode(s): 399-400

videos.title: Kizaru Arrives
videos.overview:
Luffy and his crew decide to lay low in town while Rayleigh coats the Sunny. Meanwhile, Admiral Kizaru from Marine HQ arrives on the archipelago in search of those responsible for threatening the Celestial Dragons.

Manga Chapter(s): 507-508
Anime Episode(s): 400-401

videos.title: Kizaru vs. the Four Captains
videos.overview:
While four super rookies square off against Kizaru, the Straw Hats combine their strongest attacks to defeat the pacifista menacing them. The battle is barely won when yet another, deadlier foe comes to take its place.

Manga Chapter(s): 509-511
Anime Episode(s): 402-404

videos.title: I Couldn't Save Them!!!
videos.overview:
In the face of overwhelming danger, Luffy orders a full retreat. However, Warlord Kuma cuts off their frenzied escape and uses a harrowing touch of his devil fruit powers against Luffy's crewmates, one by one.

Manga Chapter(s): 512-513
Anime Episode(s): 404-405

videos.title: Adventure on the Island of Women
videos.overview:
Luffy finds himself alone, stranded and starving on an unfamiliar island. After a run-in with some exotic mushrooms, he is approached by a team of female warriors who could be friend... or foe.

Manga Chapter(s): 514-515
Anime Episode(s): 408-409

videos.title: Pirate Empress Boa Hancock
videos.overview:
Luffy storms the village of women in hopes of acquiring a boat. However, a misstep lands him in the personal bath of none other than the Snake Princess. As he peers through the steam rising from its waters, he sees a forbidden secret etched upon her back.

Manga Chapter(s): 516-517
Anime Episode(s): 410-411

videos.title: The Arena
videos.overview:
Luffy is sentenced to execution by arena combat with Boa Hancock's serpentine sisters. Luffy soon discovers that the two women have a mysterious ability that allows them to slither through all his attacks unharmed.

Manga Chapter(s): 518-519
Anime Episode(s): 412-413

videos.title: Hancock's Confession
videos.overview:
Impressed by Luffy's efforts to protect the secret of the snake sisters, Hancock reveals the story behind the familiar mark on their backs. Their childhood was tragic, suffered at the hands of a corrupt group that Luffy knows all too well.

Manga Chapter(s): 520-522
Anime Episode(s): 414-417

videos.title: No One Can Stop This Now
videos.overview:
As Luffy prepares to depart Amazon Lily, Hancock suddenly takes ill. Taking heed of the knowledge and wisdom of Elder Nyon, the Snake Princess "recovers," and a plan to save Ace is quickly hatched.

Manga Chapter(s): 523-524
Anime Episode(s): 417-421

videos.title: The Underwater Prison, Impel Down
videos.overview:
To rescue his brother Ace, Luffy must infiltrate the well-guarded prison Impel Down. He eludes the watchful eyes of security for a time, and then, for better or worse, a certain red-nosed criminal appears.

Manga Chapter(s): 525-526
Anime Episode(s): 422-423, 454

videos.title: First Son of the Sea
videos.overview:
After forming an unlikely alliance, Luffy rushes through Impel Down aided by Buggy's powers. Meanwhile, Ace finds himself with an unlikely companion as well when he exchanges words with a powerful pirate prisoner.

Manga Chapter(s): 527-528
Anime Episode(s): 424-425, 430

videos.title: From One Hell to Another
videos.overview:
Luffy and his dubious companions face off against the mythical beasts of Level 2. Impel Down is put on lockdown, its only exit sealed, but Luffy, unaware and unafraid, continues to Ace's floor, only to have another unexpected reunion.

Manga Chapter(s): 529-531
Anime Episode(s): 425, 430-432

videos.title: Inferno Hell
videos.overview:
Luffy and his deranged team pummel everything from Level 3 to Level 4 that dares to stand in their path. However, the powerful guard Minotaurus is ready to do some pummeling of his own while a boiling bath of blood awaits below.

Manga Chapter(s): 532-533
Anime Episode(s): 433-434

videos.title: Friend
videos.overview:
With nowhere to run, Luffy's desperation to save Ace forces him to make a very grim sacrifice against his venomous adversary. Down in the frozen depths of Level 5, Bon Kurei rushes to his friend's aid, betting on a distant hope.

Manga Chapter(s): 534-536
Anime Episode(s): 435-438, 446

videos.title: A Ray of Hope
videos.overview:
Bon Kurei wanders through Level 5 in search of a mysterious missing prisoner. However, the fearsome wolves and bitter cold eventually take their toll, and he collapses in the Freezing Hell all while Luffy's life continues to dwindle away.

Manga Chapter(s): 537-538
Anime Episode(s): 438-440

videos.title: Infinite Hell
videos.overview:
Luffy is back in action, and he prepares to set off, now with even more powerful allies who have ties to his old man. When they reach the lowest level of Impel Down, the legendary Level 6, they are in for a few new surprises.

Manga Chapter(s): 539-540
Anime Episode(s): 440-443

videos.title: Yet Another Epic Incident
videos.overview:
A veritable all-star team on his side, Luffy and co. battle their way back up to Level 4. On Level 2, a massive riot erupts, plunging the prison into chaos. To further complicate matters, another infamous pirate breaks into Impel Down.

Manga Chapter(s): 541-543
Anime Episode(s): 443-446

videos.title: To Sunshine and Freedom
videos.overview:
It is utter chaos in Impel Down, and between the sudden appearance of Blackbeard, the vice warden's interference, and Magellan's dogged attempts to restore order, the escape team just might see daylight yet!

Manga Chapter(s): 544-546
Anime Episode(s): 446-450

videos.title: Thank You
videos.overview:
Thanks to Jinbe's quick thinking, Luffy and co. narrowly escape Impel Down. However, the Gates of Justice remain closed, and a horde of Marine ships is gaining on them. Then, just when all hope seems lost, a dear friend makes an all-or-nothing gamble.

Manga Chapter(s): 547-548
Anime Episode(s): 450-451

videos.title: If You Could Go Anywhere... The Adventures of the Straw Hats
videos.overview:
Somewhere in the world... Sanji resists, while Robin meets terrible people. Franky's not himself, and Usopp learns to survive. Chopper avoids becoming food, and Nami reports on the weather. Brook is repaid in underpants, and Zoro... is lost and annoyed.

Manga Chapter(s): 543-560
Anime Episode(s): 453-456

videos.title: Marine Headquarters
videos.overview:
Fifty warships, 100,000 Marines, the Seven Warlords, and three admirals: Akainu, Aokiji, and Kizaru. The stage is set, and, as a battle with Whitebeard looms, Fleet Admiral Sengoku reveals a shocking truth about Ace.

Manga Chapter(s): 549-550
Anime Episode(s): 452, 459

videos.title: Ace and Whitebeard
videos.overview:
To the surprise of all, the Moby Dick surfaces in the middle of Marineford! On the deck stands Whitebeard, the man who Ace calls father, and his fourteen commanders, the pirates he calls family, who share Luffy's determination to stop the execution.

Manga Chapter(s): 551-552
Anime Episode(s): 459-462

videos.title: Conflict at the Summit
videos.overview:
The players have assembled at last! Whitebeard unleashes a tsunami that is set to swallow every marine and turn Marine HQ upside down. The fight has just begun, as Marine admirals and pirate commanders alike showcase their incredible abilities.

Manga Chapter(s): 553-554
Anime Episode(s): 462-463

videos.title: Justice Will Prevail!!
videos.overview:
A larger-than-life ally risks his life to pave the way forward, and the Whitebeard Pirates rush toward Ace. However, just as their rescue mission picks up momentum, Sengoku employs a surprise tactic that turns the tide yet again.

Manga Chapter(s): 555-556
Anime Episode(s): 464-465

videos.title: Luffy and Whitebeard
videos.overview:
Luffy leaps into the fray! Battling against familiar faces and new foes alike, he races toward the scaffold like a whirlwind of destruction, and, as his brother begs for him to turn back, Luffy shares some powerful words of his own.

Manga Chapter(s): 557-558
Anime Episode(s): 466-468

videos.title: The Prisoners of Impel Down
videos.overview:
Facing Kuma on the battlefield, Ivankov reveals their shared past, but his pleas to his old companion fall on deaf ears as Kuma continues his attacks. In a sea of confusion, only Doflamingo seems to know the truth.

Manga Chapter(s): 559-560
Anime Episode(s): 468-469

videos.title: The Whirl Spider
videos.overview:
Luffy's progress is halted by Mihawk, but the Whitebeard Pirates counter with a swordsman of their own. Then, when an army of human weapons encircle the battlefield, Luffy and his allies find themselves overwhelmed by their explosive attacks.

Manga Chapter(s): 561-562
Anime Episode(s): 470-471

videos.title: The Man Who Shook the World
videos.overview:
Squard's betrayal of Whitebeard sends ripples of distrust and uncertainty throughout the pirate alliance. And yet, Whitebeard's faith will not be shattered, and it soon becomes clear that his allies are falling into a clever setup launched by the Marines.

Manga Chapter(s): 563-564
Anime Episode(s): 472-473

videos.title: Assault
videos.overview:
The pirates are trapped in the bay, held there by Akainu's magma. Amid the chaos, the order for Ace's execution is given, and Luffy makes a drastic decision that puts him face-to-face with the Marines' most powerful men.

Manga Chapter(s): 565-566
Anime Episode(s): 474-475

videos.title: Oris Plaza
videos.overview:
His adopted son within reach, Whitebeard charges forth, undeterred by the strongest the Marines have to offer. With both sides swinging between victory and defeat, the battlefield plunges into chaos. Then Marco takes to the sky and soars to Ace's side!

Manga Chapter(s): 567
Anime Episode(s): 476

videos.title: The White Monster
videos.overview:
Faced with the might of the admirals, even Whitebeard's commanders falter. Refusing to relent, Luffy begs Ivankov for a final chance at victory. Amid a bevy of Marines, an old friend of Luffy's appears for a much too premature reunion.

Manga Chapter(s): 568-569
Anime Episode(s): 477-478

videos.title: The Execution Platform
videos.overview:
Having borne witness to Luffy's latent powers, the Marines send everything they have at him. But thanks to Ivankov's quick thinking, Luffy ascends toward Ace. Garp, unable to watch any longer, leaps into Luffy's path.

Manga Chapter(s): 570-571
Anime Episode(s): 479-480

videos.title: The Times They Are A-Changin'
videos.overview:
Ace is free at last, and the pair of brothers are unstoppable! Although the Whitebeard Pirates are emboldened by their teamwork, their captain is not convinced that their escape will come so easily, and Whitebeard makes a difficult decision.

Manga Chapter(s): 572-573
Anime Episode(s): 481-482

videos.title: Thank You for Loving Me
videos.overview:
Ace protects his brother from Akainu but suffers a mortal blow in the process. Jinbe and the Whitebeard Pirates rush to his aid but soon realize he is far beyond help. As Ace takes his final breaths, he imparts a heartfelt message.

Manga Chapter(s): 574
Anime Episode(s): 483-484

videos.title: Edward Newgate
videos.overview:
Blackbeard appears, Thatch's murder and Ace's capture all part of a terrifying plan that no one could have imagined! With the war in its final stage, Whitebeard fights to avenge his fallen sons and to punish the traitor who plotted his undoing.

Manga Chapter(s): 575-576
Anime Episode(s): 484-485

videos.title: A Gift to a New Era
videos.overview:
Though Ace and Whitebeard have been killed, the Marines seek to wipe out every last pirate, even as they retreat. In the confusion, Akainu sets his eyes on the unconscious Luffy. Meanwhile, Blackbeard reveals his true scheme and a terrifying new power!

Manga Chapter(s): 577-578
Anime Episode(s): 486-487

videos.title: The War's Conclusion
videos.overview:
Senseless violence dyes the battlefield red with blood. Luffy's allies struggle to save him as the admirals maintain their assault. Suddenly, the Red Hair Pirates appear! Narrowly missing a reunion with Luffy, Shanks utters a speech on the battlefield.

Manga Chapter(s): 579-580
Anime Episode(s): 488-489

videos.title: Creeping Future
videos.overview:
The Summit War has thrown the entire world into chaos. Emboldened by Whitebeard's final words, pirates once again envision a wave they can ride into a new era. At Hancock's order, Luffy is taken to Amazon Lily to hide from the Marines while he recovers.

Manga Chapter(s): 581-582
Anime Episode(s): 490-491

videos.title: Gray Terminal
videos.overview:
Before they were brothers, Ace and Luffy lived in the mountains, dreaming of the day when they would take to the sea. In the criminal-infested junkyard known as Gray Terminal, Ace and his partner-in-crime Sabo robbed the thieves and scavengers.

Manga Chapter(s): 583-584
Anime Episode(s): 493-495

videos.title: Oath of Brotherhood
videos.overview:
Ace, Sabo, and Luffy made a promise to one another over cups of sake that would shape their futures. Yet while the brothers' adventures continue, Sabo's unfortunate past catches up with him. Meanwhile, a horrific plot unfolds.

Manga Chapter(s): 585-586
Anime Episode(s): 496-498, 500-501

videos.title: Sabo's Sea
videos.overview:
Even as the fires in Gray Terminal threatened to consume them, Ace and Luffy fought Bluejam with all their might! In the wake of the tragedy, Sabo seized freedom in his hands and took to the sea, just as a Celestial Dragon arrived in High Town.

Manga Chapter(s): 587-588
Anime Episode(s): 501-503

videos.title: Will of the Winds
videos.overview:
Luffy and Ace buried their sorrow and grew stronger day by day as they trained to be pirates. Time marched on, and they eventually bade farewell to their childhood home and took to the sea, hoping to achieve the dream that Sabo could not.

Manga Chapter(s): 589-590
Anime Episode(s): 503-505

videos.title: Cheer
videos.overview:
Determined to return to Sabaody and keep his promise to his crew, Luffy prepares for departure. However, when Dark King Rayleigh appears and makes him a surprising offer, Luffy is forced to make a decision that could alter the fate of his entire journey.

Manga Chapter(s): 591-592
Anime Episode(s): 507-510

videos.title: NEWS
videos.overview:
Although Marine HQ is in ruins after the Summit War, Marines and reporters still stalk its grounds. Luffy, Rayleigh, and Jinbe return to where Ace died to carry out a mysterious plan. If all goes well, Luffy's crew will understand his actions.

Manga Chapter(s): 593-594
Anime Episode(s): 510-512

videos.title: 3D2Y
videos.overview:
The Straw Hat Pirates have interpreted their captain's message to meet up again in two years. During this time, they will prepare themselves for the New World! In the Calm Belt, Luffy arrives in Luscaina to begin training under Rayleigh.

Manga Chapter(s): 595-597
Anime Episode(s): 513-516
