Jinbe reunites with Luffy in the undersea forest and reveals a shocking connection to an old foe. The former Warlord begins a tale of when two famous figures fought to undo the animosity that existed between humans and fishmen.

Manga Chapter(s): 619-620
Anime Episode(s): 538-539, 541

videos.title: Otohime, Fisher Tiger, and the Sun Pirates! The Fateful Encounter!
videos.overview:
Queen Otohime tried to lead the Ryugu Kingdom into an era of coexistence between humans and fishmen. At the same time, the heroic Fisher Tiger battled humans to free their slaves from captivity.

Manga Chapter(s): 621-622
Anime Episode(s): 540-541

videos.title: The Shocking Truth of Tiger! The End of the Sun Pirates
videos.overview:
Fisher Tiger's past quickly caught up to him, and he left his crew with a sobering, final command. While Jinbe vowed to uphold Tiger's and Otohime's ideals, Arlong's resentment only grew, and soon, the Sun Pirates faced a crisis of identity.

Manga Chapter(s): 623-624
Anime Episode(s): 543-545

videos.title: The Shipwrecked Celestial Dragon! A Bullet That Seals the Future
videos.overview:
The sudden appearance of a Celestial Dragon almost imperiled Fishman Island, but Queen Otohime's ability to end hostilities provided a ray of hope for everyone. Just when the path to the future seemed bright, a shot echoed through the plaza.

Manga Chapter(s): 625-626
Anime Episode(s): 545-546

videos.title: Shaking of the Kingdom! Luffy vs. Jinbe!
videos.overview:
After completing his tale, Jinbe begs Nami for forgiveness. Soon after, Hody broadcasts across all of Fishman Island, and all watch in horror as he conducts his hostile takeover. Luffy is ready to fight, but Jinbe has something else in mind.

Manga Chapter(s): 627-629
Anime Episode(s): 547-550

videos.title: Gyoncorde Plaza Gathering! The Evil Drug's True Power
videos.overview:
Hody experiences a strange side effect of the energy steroids, and his body undergoes a horrifying transformation! The three princes of the Ryugu Kingdom rush to the scene, but Hody's crewmates have a dirty trick up their sleeves.

Manga Chapter(s): 630-631
Anime Episode(s): 550-551

videos.title: Hody's Dark Secret! The Straw Hats' Arrival
videos.overview:
Shirahoshi and Jinbe hurry to free King Neptune but run headlong into a trap. There, Hody reveals a shocking truth about the history of his revolution, but even in the face of Hody's cruelty, Shirahoshi holds true to her mother's dying wish.

Manga Chapter(s): 632-633
Anime Episode(s): 552-553

videos.title: 100,000 vs. 10! The Straw Hats' Explosive Moves
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats have reassembled at last, an army of New Fishman Pirates standing before them. With the last two years still fresh in their minds, the Straw Hats' training is put to the test, and they unleash a flurry of new techniques.

Manga Chapter(s): 634-635
Anime Episode(s): 554-556

videos.title: The General from the Future Land and the Crisis of Fishman Island's Destruction
videos.overview:
Franky's mechanical masterpieces have transformations in store that can only be described as "super!" However, onlookers curb their enthusiasm when a foreboding shadow is cast upon the plaza by a giant ship hurtling toward the island!

Manga Chapter(s): 636-637
Anime Episode(s): 556-558

videos.title: I'll Protect Everything
videos.overview:
Shirahoshi flees into the open sea, hoping to draw the Noah away from Fishman Island. Luffy follows her, but he must contend with Hody Jones along the way. Luckily, the appearance of a new ally gives Luffy a chance to protect Shirahoshi.

Manga Chapter(s): 638-639
Anime Episode(s): 559-560

videos.title: What Are You?
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats hold their own against the powerful officers from Hody's crew. But their struggle will be in vain if Luffy cannot stop the Noah. Meanwhile, Hody becomes stronger than ever.

Manga Chapter(s): 640-641
Anime Episode(s): 561-562

videos.title: Phantom
videos.overview:
Neptune's army aids the Straw Hats against the New Fishman Pirates, finally accepting the crew as allies. As the fight continues, Fukaboshi's transponder snail reveals the bone chilling truth behind Hody's motivations.

Manga Chapter(s): 642-645
Anime Episode(s): 563-567

videos.title: Death Is Also Revenge
videos.overview:
Luffy has a fist of fire with Hody's name on it, and the rest of the Straw Hats push forward with all their might. Hody takes even more energy steroids, and a gravely injured Luffy struggles to overcome the fishman's unbelievable stamina.

Manga Chapter(s): 643-646
Anime Episode(s): 562-567

videos.title: The Path Toward the Sun
videos.overview:
Hody is vanquished, the Noah is stopped, and Fishman Island is saved! Unfortunately, Luffy was gravely injured in the process. With no time to spare, a true friend steps forward to tear down the walls of the island's history.

Manga Chapter(s): 647-649
Anime Episode(s): 567-569

videos.title: The Voice from the New World
videos.overview:
When pirates working for Big Mom appear, Fishman Island falls under threat from an adversary even stronger than Hody. Luffy steps up to save the fishmen once again but may doom himself by antagonizing one of the strongest pirates in the New World.

Manga Chapter(s): 650-651
Anime Episode(s): 570-571

videos.title: The Hero's Hat
videos.overview:
Filled with both excitement and trepidation, the crew finally sets sail for the New World. After bidding their fond farewells, the Straw Hats leave with a new log pose in hand. Overcoming trials and tragedies, Luffy's dream is on course once again!

Manga Chapter(s): 652-653
Anime Episode(s): 572-573

videos.title: Punk Hazard
videos.overview:
Fresh off the adventure at Fishman Island, the Sunny is caught in a massive whirlpool and dragged off course. A desperate cry for help leads the Straw Hats to Punk Hazard, an island engulfed in flames and inhabited by a mythic beast.

Manga Chapter(s): 654-655
Anime Episode(s): 574, 579

videos.title: Adventure on the Burning Island
videos.overview:
Luffy, Robin, Usopp, and Zoro face a powerful dragon, and Luffy gets up close and personal with a torso-less figure. Elsewhere, Nami, Sanji, Chopper, and Franky find themselves imprisoned with the pieces of a human face!

Manga Chapter(s): 656-658
Anime Episode(s): 580-583

videos.title: About My Torso
videos.overview:
Luffy's group finds themselves up against a gang of centaurs, Brook battles an aggressive mysterious torso, and Vice Admiral Smoker encounters someone highly unexpected! Meanwhile, Nami and Chopper seek a safe exit for a group of children.

Manga Chapter(s): 659-660
Anime Episode(s): 583-585

videos.title: The Lake of Bandits
videos.overview:
Luffy's group takes a deadly plunge into icy waters, and Trafalgar Law uses his unique abilities to rearrange Nami's group and place the Straw Hats into a state of chaos! Then, things heat up when G-5 squares off with Law.

Manga Chapter(s): 661-662
Anime Episode(s): 585-587

videos.title: CC
videos.overview:
Luffy is excited to once again cross paths with Trafalgar Law. While Vice Admiral Smoker determines his next move, an exceptionally large pirate with alligator legs tells Luffy and the Straw Hats the true story of Punk Hazard's mysterious transformation!

Manga Chapter(s): 663-664
Anime Episode(s): 588-589

videos.title: Yeti Cool Brothers
videos.overview:
The giant children fly into a mysterious rage, and Chopper discovers the true reason for their unusual condition! Meanwhile, Zoro, Brook, and Sanji cross paths with a dangerous duo, and the story of how Trafalgar Law arrived at Punk Hazard is revealed.

Manga Chapter(s): 665-666
Anime Episode(s): 591-592

videos.title: Pirate Alliance
videos.overview:
Luffy agrees to an unexpected alliance with Trafalgar Law, but the Straw Hats refuse to leave the island until the children are safe. Meanwhile, the gaseous master of the island unleashes something extremely deadly!

Manga Chapter(s): 667-668
Anime Episode(s): 593-594

videos.title: Blizzard with a Chance of Slime
videos.overview:
Zoro, Sanji, and Brook continue their search for the samurai, and Law tries to sneak Chopper into the laboratory! And then, Luffy's battle with his old nemesis Smoker is interrupted by the arrival of a terrifying toxic blob.

Manga Chapter(s): 669-670
Anime Episode(s): 595-596

videos.title: My Name Is Kin'emon!!
videos.overview:
Law's plan to infiltrate Caesar's facility hits a snag when an unexpected guest complicates things. Meanwhile, Chopper investigates the Master's lab, and the mysterious samurai shows what he can do with a full body!

Manga Chapter(s): 671-672
Anime Episode(s): 597-598

videos.title: Vergo and Joker! The Beginning of Caesar's Masterplan!
videos.overview:
Caesar gathers his young test subjects, shocking secret identities are revealed, and the poisonous purple blob continues its march across the island! Meanwhile, Nami and Usopp get an unexpected helping hand in their fight to save the children.

Manga Chapter(s): 673-674
Anime Episode(s): 599-600

videos.title: The Experiment Begins! Shinokuni Unleashed!
videos.overview:
A candy addiction leads the children to return, and Caesar plans to show the world his new and improved Smiley! Luffy and the Straw Hats next find themselves pursued by a deadly cloud of gas that turns living things into statues of ash!

Manga Chapter(s): 675-676
Anime Episode(s): 601-602

videos.title: The Counterattack Begins!
videos.overview:
Law has a trick up his sleeve that turns the tide in the alliance's favor, to include an on-the-spot partnership with former foes. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, and it is all Luffy's group can do to ensure everyone's safety in the lab.

Manga Chapter(s): 677-678
Anime Episode(s): 603-604

videos.title: The Mastermind in the Shadows and the Battle Between Gas and Rubber!
videos.overview:
Law finds the room that could ruin the New World, and Luffy hopes to bring Caesar's reign of terror to a brutal end! With Law's true ambitions revealed, Doflamingo flies into action to protect his criminal operation!

Manga Chapter(s): 681-682
Anime Episode(s): 607-608

videos.title: Vice Admiral vs. Vice Admiral and the Truth Behind Punk Hazard's Destruction!
videos.overview:
Smoker attacks the estranged Vice Admiral Vergo for assaulting his men, and in the trash heap, Luffy meets something strange. Meanwhile, Caesar's bloated words to his men about the island's history do not match what occurred.

Manga Chapter(s): 683-684
Anime Episode(s): 609-610

videos.title: The Dragon Named Momonosuke and the Menacing Snow Fruit User!
videos.overview:
Luffy befriends a dragon that used to be a human boy, and Vice Admiral Smoker continues his brutal battle with the villainous Vergo. Mocha tries to keep the Master's candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet.

Manga Chapter(s): 685-686
Anime Episode(s): 611-612

videos.title: Zoro's Strongest One-Sword Style and Mocha's Plight!
videos.overview:
Zoro vs. Monet: a duel to the bitter end. But when Tashigi comes to lend a hand, she will need her full might to compensate for Zoro's weakness. Meanwhile, Mocha is running out of options for keeping the candy away from the children.

Manga Chapter(s): 687-688
Anime Episode(s): 613-614

videos.title: Luffy and Law's All-out Attack! The Takeover of the New Era!
videos.overview:
Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, and the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed! Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!

Manga Chapter(s): 689-690
Anime Episode(s): 615-616

videos.title: The Strongest Grizzly Magnum and the Assassins from Dressrosa!
videos.overview:
Law concludes his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating blow on the murderous gasbag mastermind. Meanwhile, word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar.

Manga Chapter(s): 691-692
Anime Episode(s): 617-618

videos.title: Die for Me! The Dangerous Man Makes His Move!
videos.overview:
As the Straw Hats and co. flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar's desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker's plan to forever silence his enemies. Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar.

Manga Chapter(s): 693-695
Anime Episode(s): 619-621

videos.title: The Alliance's Target and the Departure!
videos.overview:
Bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast. The weary Marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker.

Manga Chapter(s): 696-697
Anime Episode(s): 622-623

videos.title: The Arrival of the Mysterious Man and the News Coo!
videos.overview:
Doflamingo—a.k.a. Joker—arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc! Only an icy intercession can save Smoker and send Joker off to rethink his strategy. Meanwhile, the Sunny sails through the rough seas of the New World where even a bit of hail portends doom!

Manga Chapter(s): 698-699
Anime Episode(s): 624-626, 628

videos.title: Arriving at Dressrosa! The Country of Passion, Love, and Toys!
videos.overview:
Dressrosa! The Straw Hats split up and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy's group encounters an intriguing blind man whose luck has run dry.

Manga Chapter(s): 700-701
Anime Episode(s): 628-631

videos.title: Corrida Colosseum! The Great Tournament
videos.overview:
Zoro and co. strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji gets distracted by the alluring dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosan. Meanwhile, the prize of the late Ace's devil fruit draws Luffy and Franky to the colosseum.

Manga Chapter(s): 702-703
Anime Episode(s): 631-633

videos.title: The Colosseum of Many New Faces and Maynard the Pursuer!
videos.overview:
Luffy enters the tournament at Corrida Colosseum to compete for Ace's fruit, but with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal!

Manga Chapter(s): 704-705
Anime Episode(s): 633-635

videos.title: Bellamy's Changed Motivations and B Block's Start!
videos.overview:
When Block A concludes, the crowds are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner. Block B commences, and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring, but he will have to contend with Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy!

Manga Chapter(s): 706-707
Anime Episode(s): 634-637

videos.title: B Block on Fire! Outlandish Competitors and King Punch!
videos.overview:
The battle in Block B hits a crescendo as the Fighting King Elizabello II prepares his devastating King Punch! But as the powerful attack becomes imminent, the Kingdom of Prodence faction unravels!

Manga Chapter(s): 708-709
Anime Episode(s): 637-638

videos.title: To Green Bit! The Adventure in the Land of Dwarves!
videos.overview:
The Caesar Transfer Team is on approach to Green Bit, but the colossal coastal fish of Dressrosa are biting, and the connecting bridge has collapsed! The team gathers their wits to make it across, but they soon discover they are not alone on the island.

Manga Chapter(s): 710-711
Anime Episode(s): 639-642

videos.title: Doflamingo Arrives! The Ultimate Schemer!
videos.overview:
All but done for, Sanji is trapped by Violet and her crew when she suddenly changes her mind and mysteriously turns on her own men! Sanji gets in touch with Law to share a shocking secret that could unsettle all their plans in Dressrosa.

Manga Chapter(s): 712-713
Anime Episode(s): 640-643

videos.title: Closely Contested Block C! Lucy and Ucy!
videos.overview:
The Sunny is mysteriously deformed by Giolla's strange powers! Meanwhile, the battle for Block C is under way, but Luffy suffers a staggering setback. He eventually knocks down the giant Hajrudin, but Chinjao has his sights set on Garp's grandson!

Manga Chapter(s): 714-715
Anime Episode(s): 643-645

videos.title: C Block's Blazing Battle and the Forgotten of Dressrosa!
videos.overview:
In the colosseum, Chinjao finally faces Luffy and reveals the old grudge he bears against Garp! Meanwhile, Usopp and Robin get swept up in the Tontattas' raid against the royal family, and Franky learns the eerie secret of Dressrosa's living toys.

Manga Chapter(s): 716-717
Anime Episode(s): 646-647

videos.title: The Tontatta Rebellion and the C Block Finale!
videos.overview:
The Tontattas gear up for their all-out assault on the Doflamingo Family, and Usopp and Robin are caught up in the war effort! Meanwhile, Luffy concludes his earth-shattering fight to the death with Don Chinjao.

Manga Chapter(s): 718-719
Anime Episode(s): 648-649

videos.title: A Sad Past! Rebecca and Soldier-san
videos.overview:
A voice from the past unsettles Luffy and sends him into a rage! Also, it's discovered that Rebecca's eternal bond with the one-legged toy soldier is linked to the violent overthrow of the old regime, perpetrated by none other than Doflamingo!

Manga Chapter(s): 720-721
Anime Episode(s): 650-651

videos.title: D Block's Fiery Start and the Heavenly Demon's Revelation!
videos.overview:
As Rebecca enters the ring for the battle for Block D, the crowd shows its contempt for her heritage and vicious contenders set their sights on her. Meanwhile, Law is pinned by Fujitora, and Doflamingo has the upper hand.

Manga Chapter(s): 722-723
Anime Episode(s): 652-654

videos.title: Law's New Strategy and the Colosseum's Underground Nightmare!
videos.overview:
Law must put himself in harm's way to defend the Sunny and the Straw Hats from Doflamingo's all-out assault. Meanwhile, Bartolomeo searches the colosseum for Luffy and discovers something strange about the medical center for the defeated.

Manga Chapter(s): 724-725
Anime Episode(s): 655-657

videos.title: The Plight of the Riku Clan! The Lurking Hero Awaits in the Shadows!
videos.overview:
The losers of the colosseum who are being held below the infirmary have an unexpected addition to their numbers. Meanwhile, the history of Tontatta is made clear, as is the shocking identity of the toy soldier!

Manga Chapter(s): 726-727
Anime Episode(s): 648, 657-659

videos.title: Doflamingo's Relentless Pursuit
videos.overview:
Revealed is the sad fate of King Riku, his army, and his daughter, Princess Viola, as well as how the people of Dressrosa fell into the hands of Doflamingo. Not to mention, all the toys in the country share a mysterious secret.

Manga Chapter(s): 728-729
Anime Episode(s): 660-661

videos.title: SOP Strategy
videos.overview:
Zoro and Kin'emon make a mad dash to save Law, but Admiral Fujitora stands in their way, bringing his full power against them. The toy soldier lays out the plan to liberate the Tontattas and bring down the Doflamingo Family: Operation SOP.

Manga Chapter(s): 730-731
Anime Episode(s): 657, 662-663

videos.title: The Underground World
videos.overview:
Usopp and Robin travel via an underground tunnel dug by the tiny people of the Tontatta Tribe. On the surface, Franky makes his way to the Toys House to cause a distraction to help his crewmates, but standing in his way is quite the guy!

Manga Chapter(s): 732-733
Anime Episode(s): 664-665

videos.title: Fujitora's Outlook
videos.overview:
Viola, once a princess of the Dressrosan royal family, shows Luffy and the others a secret entrance into the palace. In the meantime, Admiral Fujitora reveals his audacious plans for the Seven Warlords of the Sea!

Manga Chapter(s): 734-735
Anime Episode(s): 666-667

videos.title: Diamante and Pica
videos.overview:
The final round at Corrida Colosseum kicks off, and Diamante joins the combatants in an all-out struggle to win the prize! Meanwhile, Luffy and co., en route to Doflamingo, are faced with an immovable member of the Donquixote Family.

Manga Chapter(s): 736-737
Anime Episode(s): 668-670

videos.title: Captain
videos.overview:
With Operation SOP in its final stage, the Tontattas are devastated by Trebol's furious attack, but as Usopp tries to convince Leo to abort the operation, Leo tells him about their commander's stunning true identity.

Manga Chapter(s): 738-739
Anime Episode(s): 670-672

videos.title: Usoland the Liar
videos.overview:
With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! Among the cries of the Tontattas, Usopp has a difficult decision to make.

Manga Chapter(s): 740-741
Anime Episode(s): 672-675

videos.title: Dressrosa in Turmoil
videos.overview:
Usopp creates a miracle! Toys across Dressrosa regain their true forms, a flood of lost memories return, and a forgotten hero launches a long overdue attack on the villainous tyrant Doflamingo!

Manga Chapter(s): 742-743
Anime Episode(s): 675-678

videos.title: Bird Cage
videos.overview:
Sabo makes a risky move to end the championship battle, and Luffy hurries to free Law. Doflamingo's apparent defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos, but he may have a trick or two left up his sleeve.

Manga Chapter(s): 744-745
Anime Episode(s): 678-680

videos.title: Executive Officer Pica
videos.overview:
Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game with the highest bounty reserved for... Usopp! As Luffy and co. head toward the palace, Fujitora stands in their way, and Pica emerges in town to change the stakes of the game.

Manga Chapter(s): 746-747
Anime Episode(s): 681-683

videos.title: Onward!! Army of Rogues
videos.overview:
The game is afoot, and Luffy finds that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! Strangely, an argument breaks out to decide who gets the honor of taking down Doflamingo once and for all!

Manga Chapter(s): 748-749
Anime Episode(s): 683-686

videos.title: The State of the War
videos.overview:
Law's reason for despising Doflamingo is revealed! Luffy heads toward Doflamingo's refuge, making his way through the guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who is now armed with a familiar fiery power!

Manga Chapter(s): 750-751
Anime Episode(s): 685-688

videos.title: Battle
videos.overview:
Heavy hitters from the colosseum turn from wringing each other's necks toward a unified plan, which might be just enough to give Luffy the chance he needs to make it to a final showdown with Doflamingo.

Manga Chapter(s): 752-753
Anime Episode(s): 688-691

videos.title: A Man's World
videos.overview:
Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along! Meanwhile, the Tontattas are in full revolt, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Senor Pink.

Manga Chapter(s): 754-755
Anime Episode(s): 691-693

videos.title: Trump Card
videos.overview:
Gladius' exploding spheres send Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling directly into Luffy and co.'s battle with some creepy dolls. Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, and Sabo tastes Fujitora's full might!

Manga Chapter(s): 756-757
Anime Episode(s): 693-696

videos.title: Secret Plan
videos.overview:
Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo. However, Sugar stands in their way, so Usopp uses Viola's clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take her out.

Manga Chapter(s): 758-759
Anime Episode(s): 694, 696-698

videos.title: The Operation Fruit
videos.overview:
All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; however, the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and he reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora's true intention.

Manga Chapter(s): 760-761
Anime Episode(s): 699-700

videos.title: White Town
videos.overview:
A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to try and kill Corazón! Law was accepted into the Doflamingo Family, but Corazón's mysterious silence hid a fact that just may have saved Law's life.

Manga Chapter(s): 762-763
Anime Episode(s): 701-702

videos.title: The Island of Fate: Minion
videos.overview:
Things grew stranger for Law when he learned the secret behind why Corazón feigned being mute. But the mysterious Corazón's actions were only beginning to baffle Law when he took him on a journey to cure the youth's disease.

Manga Chapter(s): 764-765
Anime Episode(s): 703-704

videos.title: Cora
videos.overview:
Corazón had finally obtained the Op Op Fruit! Doflamingo and his Family were zeroing in on Corazón and Law's whereabouts, so Corazón hid Law long enough to let him escape, even at the risk of his own life.

Manga Chapter(s): 766-767
Anime Episode(s): 705-706

videos.title: Bellamy the Pirate
videos.overview:
Luffy continues to fight the Doflamingo doppelganger but keeps accidentally attacking Bellamy instead. Meanwhile, the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface, and Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica.

Manga Chapter(s): 768-769
Anime Episode(s): 707-711

videos.title: The Spear of Elbaph and Don Sai
videos.overview:
Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns within him to pay back the favor he owes! Lao G and Don Chinjao bring their most devastating attacks to bear, but a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chinjao distracted.

Manga Chapter(s): 770-771
Anime Episode(s): 708-711

videos.title: Cabbage and Lomeo
videos.overview:
A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield! While it appears to help Bartolomeo and co. at first, it soon sets its sights on Robin! As he continues to battle Gladius, Bartolomeo is faced with an impossible dilemma.

Manga Chapter(s): 772-773
Anime Episode(s): 711-713

videos.title: To Russian, with Love
videos.overview:
Senor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both are pushed to their limits, Senor Pink's tragic past is revealed! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry's rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!

Manga Chapter(s): 774-775
Anime Episode(s): 714-716

videos.title: Zoro vs. Pica
videos.overview:
Pica loses his temper and becomes a terrible and true force of nature. With the lives of King Riku, Usopp, and the others in the balance, Zoro must dig deep and discover a powerful technique to counter Pica's near-unstoppable onslaught.

Manga Chapter(s): 776-778
Anime Episode(s): 716-719

videos.title: The Curse of Heart
videos.overview:
The Tontattas finish demolishing the SMILE Factory and taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law's lifeless body! Meanwhile, the birdcage draws ever tighter around Dressrosa.

Manga Chapter(s): 779-781
Anime Episode(s): 714-715, 720-723

videos.title: In My Way
videos.overview:
Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo's game. Meanwhile, neither Gear Second nor Gear Third attacks are working against Doflamingo, so Luffy decides to use something stronger!

Manga Chapter(s): 782-783
Anime Episode(s): 723-725

videos.title: Gear Fourth
videos.overview:
The birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa, so Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country. Meanwhile, Luffy digs deep into his training to provide an answer born of rubber and haki to combat Doflamingo's might.

Manga Chapter(s): 784-785
Anime Episode(s): 726-728

videos.title: Gatz
videos.overview:
Using Boundman drains Luffy of his haki, leaving him in need of a rest. Luckily, the colosseum combatants run interference while he recharges, and Sabo steps in at a crucial moment to defend his brother.

Manga Chapter(s): 786-787
Anime Episode(s): 728-730

videos.title: Heaven and Earth
videos.overview:
With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts toward slowing the birdcage. Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, advances to attack Viola, and a hero's recovery cannot come soon enough!

Manga Chapter(s): 788-790
Anime Episode(s): 730-733

videos.title: Prostration
videos.overview:
The people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy as they remember the hardships endured and the actions taken to free them. As they beg King Riku to resume the crown, Admiral Fujitora shocks onlookers with an unexpected display of humility.

Manga Chapter(s): 791-793
Anime Episode(s): 734-736

videos.title: Sabo's Adventure
videos.overview:
The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army and how he reunited with his brother Luffy at the colosseum.

Manga Chapter(s): 794-795
Anime Episode(s): 737-739

videos.title: Soldier's Conviction
videos.overview:
Major players in the Marines arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats, and Rebecca's history is whitewashed with a cover story. Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port, but not before finishing up a piece of business.

Manga Chapter(s): 796-797
Anime Episode(s): 740-742

videos.title: Father and Sons
videos.overview:
Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazón and the secret of Trafalgar Law's name. Luffy and the others finally make their break from the island; however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story of the Straw Hat Pirates!

Manga Chapter(s): 798-800
Anime Episode(s): 742-745

videos.title: Zou
videos.overview:
The mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. When the haze clears, what greets the Straw Hats is beyond anyone's expectations! Luffy and co. find the Sunny nearby, but the rest of the crew has already disembarked.

Manga Chapter(s): 801-803
Anime Episode(s): 746-747, 751-753

videos.title: The Minks
videos.overview:
The mysterious "island" may hold more danger than was bargained for, as Luffy and co. learn they are not alone! Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest, but he is treading territory where he is not welcome.

Manga Chapter(s): 804-805
Anime Episode(s): 753-754

videos.title: At Rightflank Fortress
videos.overview:
Luffy and co. ride out the rain-ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou. As they continue toward the fortress, they learn more about the mysterious minks, and are finally reunited with the others.

Manga Chapter(s): 806-807
Anime Episode(s): 755-757

videos.title: Duke Inuarashi and Master Nekomamushi
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats finally meet the daytime ruler of this strange land. They learn more about the battle that took place here and discover the mysterious system by which the island is ruled.

Manga Chapter(s): 808-809
Anime Episode(s): 757-760

videos.title: The Curly Hat Pirates Arrive
videos.overview:
While they put up a good fight, the minks were not able to subdue Jack. In the aftermath of Jack's deadly attack, Chopper and Sanji rushed in to save the fallen minks and enlisted the help of Caesar to overcome the lingering gas problem.

Manga Chapter(s): 810-811
Anime Episode(s): 759-762

videos.title: Tea Party Invitation
videos.overview:
The mystery of Sanji's disappearance only deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom's lackeys caught up with him and offered him an invitation from one of the Four Emperors that simply could not be refused.

Manga Chapter(s): 812-813
Anime Episode(s): 762-764

videos.title: Let's Go See Master Nekomamushi
videos.overview:
Being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate! The pirates make their way toward the nighttime ruler to find out more about their friend's disappearance.

Manga Chapter(s): 814-815
Anime Episode(s): 764-766

videos.title: Raizo of the Mist
videos.overview:
Revelations abound as the true nature of the men from Wano and their relationship with the minks is revealed, and Momonosuke's role is greater than any had imagined. But even more shocking is the visage of a real ninja!

Manga Chapter(s): 816-817
Anime Episode(s): 767-769

videos.title: Momonosuke, Heir of the Kozuki Family
videos.overview:
More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed, and its retainers propose an alliance to help topple one of the Four Emperors: Kaido of the Beast Pirates! But first, Luffy has some important Straw Hat business to attend to.

Manga Chapter(s): 818-819
Anime Episode(s): 769-772

videos.title: Understood
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats divide and conquer: one group to go save Sanji, and the other to Wano! But just before their departure, the tremendous elephant quakes as Jack's fleet launches an aggressive attack on the monstrous Zunesha.

Manga Chapter(s): 820-822
Anime Episode(s): 772-774, 776

videos.title: A World Abuzz
videos.overview:
Luffy's team—plus a stowaway—sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji. Meanwhile, the leading families and leaders of the world make their way to the Holy Land, Mary Geoise, for a pivotal round table conference.

Manga Chapter(s): 823-824
Anime Episode(s): 777-779, 783

videos.title: 0 and 4
videos.overview:
Without Sanji to properly identify safe and edible food, Luffy gets a stomach full of poisonous fish! With no antidotes on board, the Straw Hats must rely on a couple of mysterious—yet somehow familiar—passersby for help.

Manga Chapter(s): 825-826
Anime Episode(s): 783-785

videos.title: Totto Land
videos.overview:
Arriving on Cacao Island, Luffy and Chopper are in heaven as everything before their eyes is edible. There, the Straw Hats encounter Sanji's betrothed, Pudding, but when they challenge her for Sanji's heart, her answer is truly shocking.

Manga Chapter(s): 827-828
Anime Episode(s): 785-788

videos.title: Pirate Emperor, Charlotte Linlin
videos.overview:
Big Mom ravages Whole Cake Island in search of sweets, and while a familiar face across the waters has just what she needs, he also brings ill tidings. As the Straw Hats draw closer to the island, Pedro shares his sordid past in Big Mom's territory.

Manga Chapter(s): 829-830
Anime Episode(s): 788-790

videos.title: Adventure in the Mysterious Forest
videos.overview:
Luffy's group makes its way toward Sanji, only to be distracted by the endless supply of sweets and a second Luffy. Before they realize it, they are lost in the Seducing Woods! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his older brother.

Manga Chapter(s): 831-832
Anime Episode(s): 791-793

videos.title: Vinsmoke Judge
videos.overview:
Sanji faces his father in a duel as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare! Meanwhile, Luffy falls for the illusions of the forest, and Big Mom has Caesar at her whims, ready to use him to continue her maniacal pursuits.

Manga Chapter(s): 833-834
Anime Episode(s): 793-795

videos.title: Lola's Vivre Card
videos.overview:
The mysterious half-buried man comes clean about his identity, but this must all be put aside when one of Big Mom's most powerful commanders comes calling. Nami's past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping the baddies at bay.

Manga Chapter(s): 835-836
Anime Episode(s): 796-798

videos.title: Luffy vs. Commander Cracker
videos.overview:
Luffy squares off against a commander of Big Mom, Charlotte Cracker, whose powers may prove more troublesome than they appear. Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro infiltrate Whole Cake Island and work out a plan to avoid getting caught.

Manga Chapter(s): 837-838
Anime Episode(s): 798-800

videos.title: The Iron Mask
videos.overview:
Sanji challenges his entire family, but they have effectively ensured he follows their wedding scheme. The truth of Germa's power and Vinsmoke Judge's dark history is also revealed. Meanwhile, Nami has recruited the homies and challenges Cracker!

Manga Chapter(s): 839-840
Anime Episode(s): 800-803, 807

videos.title: To the East Blue
videos.overview:
Sanji's tragic history included a rare moment of compassion that was his only chance at escape, but even then, his father's cruelty haunted him. In the present, Reiju helps Sanji straighten himself out before he meets with his fiancée.

Manga Chapter(s): 841-842
Anime Episode(s): 804-806

videos.title: Luffy vs. Sanji
videos.overview:
Luffy finishes off Cracker and finally catches up with Sanji, but the Straw Hats' cook seems far from thrilled about the reunion. A heartbreaking duel commences, but a steadfast Luffy makes a solemn vow to his friend and crewmate.

Manga Chapter(s): 843-844
Anime Episode(s): 806-808

videos.title: Forces of Rage
videos.overview:
Luffy stands his ground and waits for Sanji to return, but as the vengeful army washes over him, only a true friend can step in to help. At Big Mom's castle, Sanji and Pudding discuss their marriage and come to a startling conclusion!

Manga Chapter(s): 845-846
Anime Episode(s): 809-812

videos.title: Luffy and Big Mom
videos.overview:
Pedro creates a diversion for Brook to put his soulful plan into action. Meanwhile, the captured Luffy continues to goad Big Mom, and Pudding has the beginnings of rebellion stirring up inside her.

Manga Chapter(s): 847-848
Anime Episode(s): 812-815

videos.title: A Ray of Light
videos.overview:
When Pudding arrives to meet the captured Luffy and Nami, their hopefulness suddenly turns to shock! To make matters worse, Brook comes face to face with Big Mom herself! At the risk of his own well-being, Luffy desperately tries to free himself.

Manga Chapter(s): 849-850
Anime Episode(s): 814-817

videos.title: Germa's Failure
videos.overview:
Things are looking grim for Luffy and Nami until an unexpected ally appears. Elsewhere, Sanji confronts his sister about what Pudding plans to do and learns the powerful secret of their mother's undying love.

Manga Chapter(s): 851-852
Anime Episode(s): 817-820

videos.title: Not Here
videos.overview:
Luffy fights through more obstacles in search of Sanji, and Brook hears Big Mom's plan firsthand as she shares her intentions with Pudding. While Big Mom's agents believe most of the Straw Hats to be under their control, Mont d'Or has his doubts.

Manga Chapter(s): 853-854
Anime Episode(s): 820-822

videos.title: Liar
videos.overview:
Nami and co. finally locate Brook using the Mirro-world, but he is in the most inopportune of places! Meanwhile, Luffy is waylaid on his way back to the rendezvous, and Jinbe shares the awful truth about the wedding with the other Straw Hat pirates.

Manga Chapter(s): 855-856
Anime Episode(s): 823-825

videos.title: Rook
videos.overview:
Jinbe tells the Straw Hats about Capone "Gang" Bege and proposes a shocking plan to take down Big Mom! But before they are granted an audience with Bege, they must make themselves presentable.

Manga Chapter(s): 857-858
Anime Episode(s): 826-828

videos.title: Emperor Assassination Plan
videos.overview:
The plan for Big Mom's assassination is all set. Sanji heads back to his room to avoid suspicion, but Mont d'Or is hot on his trail. The day arrives, and guests from the criminal underground pour in in droves, some with their own agendas to settle.

Manga Chapter(s): 859-860
Anime Episode(s): 828-830

videos.title: Veteran Actor
videos.overview:
Final preparations abound, plans come together, and Sanji meets his bride on the altar. As the veil is lifted off Pudding's face, emotions run high, and the chaos begins! As the proverbial icing on the cake, all hell breaks loose as Luffy charges in!

Manga Chapter(s): 861-862
Anime Episode(s): 831-832

videos.title: The Honorable
videos.overview:
The wedding and the precious cake crumble to pieces around Big Mom as a slew of Luffys wreak havoc. The chaos pushes Big Mom past the edge of sanity, so her children make a move against Germa while Pudding takes aim at Sanji.

Manga Chapter(s): 863-864
Anime Episode(s): 831, 833-834

videos.title: Hey, Mother
videos.overview:
Luffy dashes toward Big Mom to show her the broken portrait again, and Sanji attempts to free his family. Here, Big Mom's tragic and sad history is revealed: from the very beginning, Big Mom's voracious hunger has brought her into conflict with others.

Manga Chapter(s): 865-866
Anime Episode(s): 835-836

videos.title: HAPPY BIRTHDAY
videos.overview:
A young Linlin managed to enrage the giants of Elbaph, but Mother Carmel begged for clemency on her behalf. After Carmel's mysterious disappearance, Linlin fell in with a new cohort and found her reason to go on living.

Manga Chapter(s): 867-868
Anime Episode(s): 837-839

videos.title: Under Siege
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats and Germa 66 become cornered in Bege's stronghold, and the full might of the Big Mom Pirates is pinning them down! It is only a matter of time before their defenses crack, so they take the only way out and make a break for it.

Manga Chapter(s): 869-870
Anime Episode(s): 839-841

videos.title: You Can Do It, Caesar!!
videos.overview:
Caesar flies the entire alliance, still inside Bege, out of the venue! However, the full might of the Big Mom Pirates proves too much. The alliance's annihilation is imminent, but something shakes the playing field.

Manga Chapter(s): 870-872
Anime Episode(s): 841-843

videos.title: Become My Servant
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats continue their mad dash to the Sunny, and Pudding puts her plan to rebuild the cake into action. As Zeus pursues the Straw Hats, Nami keeps him occupied with a shocking surprise that might stop Big Mom in her tracks!

Manga Chapter(s): 873-874
Anime Episode(s): 843-846

videos.title: A Woman's Honor
videos.overview:
Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats. Elsewhere, the plan to recreate the wedding cake progresses while Pudding's unpredictable heart confuses everyone, including herself.

Manga Chapter(s): 875-876
Anime Episode(s): 846-848

videos.title: Mink Pedro, Captain of the Guardians
videos.overview:
Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope left to the Sunny is to blast right through it all. Meanwhile, Pedro comes face-to-face with his past and does what he must to ensure the success of his friends.

Manga Chapter(s): 877-878
Anime Episode(s): 848-850

videos.title: Zero Escape
videos.overview:
In the Mirro-world, Luffy confronts the formidable Charlotte Katakuri, Big Mom's strongest child. Meanwhile, Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island to remake the cake, but they bicker like a married couple the whole time.

Manga Chapter(s): 879-880
Anime Episode(s): 851-853

videos.title: Wave Room
videos.overview:
Nami and Luffy discuss a rendezvous point while the others break the mirrors on the Sunny. Little do they know their plan is overheard, and Luffy's grueling battle against Katakuri—haki vs. haki, rubber vs. mochi—intensifies.

Manga Chapter(s): 881-883
Anime Episode(s): 853-855, 858

videos.title: Merienda
videos.overview:
Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy a merienda—a sweet chance to replenish his haki! But he is not the only one munching away. A mochi mountain has crushed Luffy, and he has found a delectable way to escape.

Manga Chapter(s): 883-884
Anime Episode(s): 856-858

videos.title: Way of Life
videos.overview:
When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing his whereabouts to his enemies. Elsewhere, Luffy uses Charlotte Brûlée as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom.

Manga Chapter(s): 885-886
Anime Episode(s): 858-860

videos.title: Lion
videos.overview:
Sanji and Bege contend with Charlotte Oven, who boils the sea itself! Meanwhile, a vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats, but Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs to action under the light of the full moon.

Manga Chapter(s): 887-888
Anime Episode(s): 860-862

videos.title: Unknown Mama
videos.overview:
Wielding Napoleon and backed by Zeus and Prometheus, Big Mom wreaks havoc on the Sunny. As the Straw Hats try to kick out the Emperor, their ship catches fire! But then, Jinbe steps up to the plate to take a swing.

Manga Chapter(s): 889-891
Anime Episode(s): 862-865

videos.title: They Believe in Me
videos.overview:
The cake is finally brought before Big Mom. With the end of her vicious rampage in sight, the Straw Hats may just get their chance to flee! Big Mom's crew is forced to decide who to attack, and Luffy grows ever closer to mastering his haki.

Manga Chapter(s): 891-893
Anime Episode(s): 865-868

videos.title: Pirate Luffy vs. Commander Katakuri
videos.overview:
Desiring revenge after complete embarrassment, Big Mom's children band together to smash the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Luffy and Katakuri are locked in a duel to end all duels, where each blow could be the last.

Manga Chapter(s): 892-895
Anime Episode(s): 865, 867-870

videos.title: One Last Thing
videos.overview:
Luffy's dramatic battle finally draws to a close, and a whole host of the Big Mom Pirates watch the last mirror to see who will come through.

Manga Chapter(s): 896-897
Anime Episode(s): 871-872

videos.title: BAD END MUSICAL
videos.overview:
Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain. Now, the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! With the help of Germa and the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape!

Manga Chapter(s): 898-900
Anime Episode(s): 873-875

videos.title: END ROLL
videos.overview:
As the Big Mom Pirate fleet approaches, Jinbe makes a crucial decision. At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies, friends, and would-be lovers.

Manga Chapter(s): 901-902
Anime Episode(s): 876-877

videos.title: The Fifth Emperor
videos.overview:
Luffy's reputation grows as all eyes look toward the Straw Hats' next move. Meanwhile, the royals of the world make their way to the Reverie, but their absence welcomes a raid by a vicious band of pirates on the Kingdom of Lulusia.

Manga Chapter(s): 903-904
Anime Episode(s): 878-880

videos.title: A Beautiful World
videos.overview:
At New Marineford, Fleet Admiral Sakazuki hears the news about Luffy while nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie! At the Red Line, Garp is escorting King Neptune's family when Shirahoshi sees the surface world for the first time.

Manga Chapter(s): 905-906
Anime Episode(s): 881-885

videos.title: The Empty Throne
videos.overview:
As the Reverie commences, Emperors Big Mom and Kaido both set their sights on Luffy! Meanwhile, a mysterious outsider visits the highest authority in the world, and the Revolutionary Army confirms its desire to save Kuma.

Manga Chapter(s): 907-908
Anime Episode(s): 886-889

videos.title: Seppuku
videos.overview:
A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, an ancient samurai ritual of seppuku—and Zoro in the crosshairs! Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some dangerous local fauna.

Manga Chapter(s): 909-911
Anime Episode(s): 892-894

videos.title: Amigasa Village
videos.overview:
Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view, and Kaido's underlings show up, too!

Manga Chapter(s): 911-912
Anime Episode(s): 894, 897

videos.title: Tsuru Returns the Favor
videos.overview:
Luffy and Zoro are stalled by Hawkins, but their fortune looks bright when a woman guides them to a teahouse. There, they find an herbal remedy for the river poison that Otama drank, while old acquaintances look on from a distance.

Manga Chapter(s): 913
Anime Episode(s): 898-899

videos.title: Okobore Town
videos.overview:
Otama is kidnapped by Kaido's gifters and taken to a flourishing settlement called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking headliner was expecting her. Luffy, Zoro, and the samurai Okiku rush to her rescue.

Manga Chapter(s): 914-915
Anime Episode(s): 900-902

videos.title: Wano's Grand Sumo Tournament
videos.overview:
Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in Wano, to a sumo match! However, Urashima is willing to resort to illegal moves. Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he must punish her for a crime she committed.

Manga Chapter(s): 915-916
Anime Episode(s): 902-903

videos.title: The Provisions Ship
videos.overview:
Luffy and co. finally find Otama hanging from the mouth of a lion in Holdem's stomach. Luffy prepares to save Otama from Kaido's lackey, and elsewhere, a mysterious figure confronts Basil Hawkins.

Manga Chapter(s): 916-917
Anime Episode(s): 904-905

videos.title: The Ruins of Oden Castle
videos.overview:
Zoro and the others dash out of Bakura Town on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them, and together, they distribute food and water to the people of Okobore Town. Later, Law takes them to the ruins of a hilltop castle.

Manga Chapter(s): 918-919
Anime Episode(s): 906, 908-909

videos.title: I Love Oden
videos.overview:
Kin'emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden brought peace to Kuri and became its daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Orochi. When Kin'emon ran to save Oden's wife, she revealed a shocking truth.

Manga Chapter(s): 919-920
Anime Episode(s): 909-911

videos.title: Shutenmaru
videos.overview:
Ashura Doji, a.k.a Shutenmaru, is one of the allies Kin'emon wants to search for, and he leads a raid on Okobore Town to steal the food that Luffy brought. This unrest prompts the drunken Kaido to fly above Okobore Town in his dragon form.

Manga Chapter(s): 921-922
Anime Episode(s): 911-913

videos.title: Emperor Kaido vs. Luffy
videos.overview:
Infuriated by Kaido's violence toward his allies, Luffy lands blow after blow on the drunken Emperor. When he activates Gear Fourth and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back. Law tries to rescue Luffy but is interrupted by Hawkins.

Manga Chapter(s): 922-923
Anime Episode(s): 914-915

videos.title: Hah
videos.overview:
Luffy is sent to a great mine where prisoners must endure harsh, forced labor. There, he has an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku rushes to the ruins of Oden Castle to confirm the safety of the Straw Hats and the others.

Manga Chapter(s): 924
Anime Episode(s): 916

videos.title: Void
videos.overview:
Perona prepares to leave Gloom Island after she finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is still alive. Meanwhile, Moria raids the infamous Pirate Island with his zombie army to retrieve his old friend from Blackbeard.

Manga Chapter(s): 925-926
Anime Episode(s): 917-919, 924

videos.title: Otoko the Kamuro
videos.overview:
In the Prisoner Mining Camp, Luffy's and Kid's competition garners the wrong kind of attention. Meanwhile, Sanji's soba becomes immensely popular, but gang members disturb his business and knock over a customer's bowl.

Manga Chapter(s): 926-927
Anime Episode(s): 919-922

videos.title: Oiran Komurasaki Arrives
videos.overview:
Wano's top courtesan—the oiran Komurasaki—is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. While everyone is fascinated by the oiran, some seeking vengeance get in her way.

Manga Chapter(s): 928-930
Anime Episode(s): 921-923

videos.title: Soba Mask
videos.overview:
In the Flower Capital, a member of the Beast Pirates, Page One, attacks every soba restaurant in search of Sanji. The Straw Hat's cook faces Kaido's headliner while using Germa's device for the first time to hide his identity.

Manga Chapter(s): 930-931
Anime Episode(s): 923-926

videos.title: The Shogun and the Oiran
videos.overview:
At the shogun's banquet, the oiran's child attendant Otoko bursts with laughter and cannot stop. The enraged Shogun Orochi attacks her, but an unexpected person stands in his way. To end the to-do, Kyoshiro takes matters into his own hands.

Manga Chapter(s): 932-933
Anime Episode(s): 926-928

videos.title: Hyogoro the Flower
videos.overview:
Chopper's group is off to rescue Luffy from the Prisoner Mining Camp, but the Straw Hat captain is in a bit of a bind. While Luffy tries to save old man Hyo from execution, Queen the Plague comes to visit the prison.

Manga Chapter(s): 934-935
Anime Episode(s): 929-931

videos.title: Gyukimaru of Bandit's Bridge
videos.overview:
Luffy fights in an endless sumo match to protect old man Hyo, and Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are cornered as Hawkins raids the bathhouse. Elsewhere, Zoro faces a samurai who accuses him of stealing Shusui, but their duel is interrupted by a woman's scream.

Manga Chapter(s): 936-938
Anime Episode(s): 931-934

videos.title: A Woman's Secret
videos.overview:
The wounded Zoro wakes up to find out the shocking identity of the woman he saved and is told the unbelievable tale of twenty years earlier. Meanwhile, Luffy's "training" is not getting anywhere, but a surprising person gives him his first lesson.

Manga Chapter(s): 938-939
Anime Episode(s): 934-937

videos.title: Sparks of Rebellion
videos.overview:
The smiling man Tonoyasu leaves all who met him mystified, what with his familiar terms of address and his shocking knowledge of the rebellion. In Udon prison, Luffy continues his new haki training, and during a brief respite, Raizo appears before him.

Manga Chapter(s): 940-941
Anime Episode(s): 936-938

videos.title: Shimotsuki Yasuie, the Daimyo of Hakumai
videos.overview:
Tonoyasu has been strung up and awaits his inevitable execution while all of Wano is shocked to find out who he really is. The citizens cry out in outrage, and the doomed man raises his voice in a final act of rebellion against Shogun Orochi.

Manga Chapter(s): 941-943
Anime Episode(s): 939-940

videos.title: SMILE
videos.overview:
The truth behind the smiles of the Ebisu villagers finally comes to light, the Shogun and Kaido's plan revealed! And in Udon Luffy and Hyo are shocked to see Captain Kid return in chains alongside a smiling newcomer.

Manga Chapter(s): 943-944
Anime Episode(s): 941-943

videos.title: Olin
videos.overview:
A very big and hungry visitor arrives at Udon looking for Superstar Queen's sweet red bean oshiruko, and Rasetsu town is in a full-blown riot with the Straw Hats at the center!

Manga Chapter(s): 945
Anime Episode(s): 942-944

videos.title: Queen vs. Olin
videos.overview:
To Chopper's surprise, the kind and sweet Olin—a.k.a. Emperor Big Mom—has proven her power to be just as devastating as ever. Olin's hunger pangs just about reach their limit, and Luffy must act quickly before his mechanical collar executes him.

Manga Chapter(s): 946-947
Anime Episode(s): 945-947

videos.title: Mummy
videos.overview:
Babanuki unleashes an unthinkable weapon, and a mysterious figure emerges from a forbidden cell to save Luffy. Then, Old Man Hyo emboldens Raizo and Kiku to reveal their true identities and give the desperate prisoners some much-needed hope.

Manga Chapter(s): 948-949
Anime Episode(s): 947-949

videos.title: A Soldier's Dream
videos.overview:
In Udon, an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners renewed hope! Elsewhere, Zoro and Hiyori are pursued by ninja, Orochi is told of Trafalgar Law's capture, and the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.

Manga Chapter(s): 950-951
Anime Episode(s): 950-951

videos.title: RAMPAGE
videos.overview:
Kanjuro takes Yasuie's body to bury him with Oden, and Robin, Usopp, and Brook cleverly pass a checkpoint. While Big Mom and Kaido clash at Onigashima, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies in Udon. And in Ringo, Zoro faces Gyukimaru once more.

Manga Chapter(s): 952-953
Anime Episode(s): 952-953

videos.title: Once a Fox
videos.overview:
Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took Shusui, and Kawamatsu shares his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. Soon, they find a room filled with swords, and Hiyori tells Zoro to give Shusui back to the land of Wano.

Manga Chapter(s): 953-954
Anime Episode(s): 954-955

videos.title: Enma
videos.overview:
As the day of the raid approaches, Kin'emon discusses the plan, and at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a surprising declaration! In the meantime, Zoro is stunned by Enma's demonic power and its ties to him.

Manga Chapter(s): 954-955
Anime Episode(s): 955-956

videos.title: Big News
videos.overview:
The resolution that passed during the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, Captain Koby secretly contacts someone currently in Wano.

Manga Chapter(s): 956
Anime Episode(s): 957

videos.title: Ultimate
videos.overview:
Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance between two Emperors. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Marines about the legendary Rocks Pirates.

Manga Chapter(s): 957
Anime Episode(s): 958

videos.title: The Designated Port
videos.overview:
On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi heads for Onigashima where a big banquet is being held, and the Red Scabbards meet at the Tokage Port rendezvous point. However, Kin'emon and his compatriots are stunned that none of their allies are there.

Manga Chapter(s): 958-959
Anime Episode(s): 959-960

videos.title: The Day of the Mountain God
videos.overview:
Forty-one years ago, Oden had not yet earned the respect of everyone, but when the angry mountain god almost killed Kin'emon, Oden stepped in. Still, disavowed by his father, Oden journeyed around the country, gathering followers as he went.

Manga Chapter(s): 960-961
Anime Episode(s): 960-961

videos.title: Daimyo and Retainers
videos.overview:
Oden transformed Kuri and was made Daimyo over it. He also met a kappa fishman and two minks, who soon became his followers. Kin'emon and the other vassals took Yasuie's strong words to heart and began transforming themselves for their lord.

Manga Chapter(s): 962-963
Anime Episode(s): 961-963

videos.title: Oden's Adventure
videos.overview:
As Oden began his voyage, he was in awe of all the things that he had never seen before, and for the first time in his life, he became a wanted person and made the headlines, catching the eye of a high-profile figure.

Manga Chapter(s): 964-965
Anime Episode(s): 963-964

videos.title: Roger and Whitebeard
videos.overview:
Back in Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki seemed to fall critically ill and named Orochi proxy Shogun. Meanwhile, Whitebeard's crew made landfall where the Roger Pirates were fighting against the Marines on the other side of the island.

Manga Chapter(s): 965-966
Anime Episode(s): 964-967

videos.title: Roger's Adventure
videos.overview:
Oden visits Wano and sees his retainers for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea and leaves his family behind in their care. After stopping at Zou for the final red poneglyph, the Roger Pirates finally make it to the last island.

Manga Chapter(s): 967
Anime Episode(s): 967-968

videos.title: Fool of a Lord
videos.overview:
The Roger Pirates have completed their grand adventure, and the King of the Pirates is born! Gol D. Roger disbands his merry crew and Oden returns triumphant to his homeland of Wano. However, a sinister surprise awaits him upon his rightful throne.

Manga Chapter(s): 968-969
Anime Episode(s): 969-971

videos.title: Oden Was Meant to Boil
videos.overview:
Oden and his retainers are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive, and an amused Kaido accepts. Meanwhile, Shinobu reveals to surprised citizens what Oden had been doing to save the country.

Manga Chapter(s): 970-972
Anime Episode(s): 971-975

videos.title: The Kozuki Clan
videos.overview:
After Kaido attacks Oden's family in their castle, Toki uses her power one last time and makes a prophecy to the people of Wano. Twenty years later, the raid on Onigashima is imminent, but the sting of betrayal hits hardest on the eve of triumph!

Manga Chapter(s): 972-974
Anime Episode(s): 975-977

videos.title: Kin'emon's Clever Ruse
videos.overview:
As the Scabbards and their comrades struggle to rescue the kidnapped Momo, two unforseen allies join the fight: one thought long gone 20 years ago and another pledging his loyalty to Luffy.

Manga Chapter(s): 975-976
Anime Episode(s): 978-980

videos.title: The Party's Off!!!
videos.overview:
The triumphant return of Jinbe sees him officially join the Straw Hats as their helmsman. As the Ninja-Pirate-Mink-Samurai Alliance plans the first steps of the raid on Onigashima, the Straw Hats look for a way to celebrate their new crewmate.

Manga Chapter(s): 977-978
Anime Episode(s): 981-982

videos.title: A Family Matter
videos.overview:
The raid on Onigashima kicks off with Law's group sneaking around the back and Luffy's group moving straight through the front door, cleverly disguised as the enemy itself! Meanwhile, Kaido holds an audience with the Soaring Six.

Manga Chapter(s): 978-979
Anime Episode(s): 983-985

videos.title: Fighting Music
videos.overview:
Luffy and Zoro are outed by Scratchman Apoo, and Queen announces that anyone who catches them will get a coveted promotion. Elsewhere, Kin'emon's infiltration strategy evolves while Big Mom's children are greeted by a surprise party crasher.

Manga Chapter(s): 980-981
Anime Episode(s): 985-988

videos.title: Thunder
videos.overview:
Kanjuro arrives before Orochi and Kaido with Momonosuke in tow and Big Mom chases Chopper and Usopp. Meanwhile, Luffy butts heads with Page One's doting sister Ulti, but unbeknownst to Straw Hat, he's also about to meet Kaido's runaway son...

Manga Chapter(s): 982-983
Anime Episode(s): 988-991

videos.title: My Bible
videos.overview:
Yamato notices something in Luffy that reminds him of someone from long ago. When Orochi declares he will execute Momonosuke, Kaido adds to the excitement with a big announcement, and at the rear of the mansion, the Red Scabbards reunite!

Manga Chapter(s): 984-985
Anime Episode(s): 991-994

videos.title: Retainers of Glory
videos.overview:
The stage is set, the curtain is drawn, and the Red Scabbards approach their target of 20 years. Luffy and Yamato burst onto the Performance Floor with a bang, and Wano's samurai make the opening attack for the long-anticipated battle.

Manga Chapter(s): 986-987
Anime Episode(s): 994-997

videos.title: I Can't Imagine Losing
videos.overview:
Momonosuke is finally freed, and King and Queen must contend with the incursion of samurai and pirates on the Performance Floor. Big Mom is swiftly removed from the situation, and the Straw Hat pirates gather once more as the assualt kicks off!

Manga Chapter(s): 988-989
Anime Episode(s): 997-1000

videos.title: Army of One
videos.overview:
Luffy invokes memories of the Straw Hats pirates' battle against Oars as he topples one of the gargantuan Numbers... with the help of an unforeseen ally! Meanwhile, Queen readies a demonic secret weapon that will ice over the samurai invasion.

Manga Chapter(s): 990-991
Anime Episode(s): 1001-1003

videos.title: Remnants
videos.overview:
Yamato continues to pursue Momonosuke as Shinobu scurries with him through the halls of Onigashima. Meanwhile, the battle on the roof intensifies as the Scabbards fight with honor to prove they are not just cheap imitations of the great Kozuki Oden.

Manga Chapter(s): 992-993
Anime Episode(s): 1003-1006

videos.title: A Kunoichi's Oath
videos.overview:
Friend and foe alike fall victim to Queen's chilling virus, and Apoo is playing keep-away with the vial of antibodies. Perospero and Marco's brief alliance is shattered, and so are Nami and Usopp's skulls as they face down Ulti and Page One.

Manga Chapter(s): 994-995
Anime Episode(s): 1006-1009

videos.title: Flame Clouds
videos.overview:
In the midst of the chaos on the Performance Floor, Chopper learns the secret behind Queen's latest plague. Meanwhile, Big Mom reaches the roof, Sanji hurries in the name of love, and Zoro watches as something falls from the hole in the ceiling.

Manga Chapter(s): 996-997
Anime Episode(s): 1009-1011

videos.title: The Sake I Brewed to Drink With You
videos.overview:
Sanji gets himself caught in Black Maria's web, Jinbe faces Who's-Who, and Yamato tells of the time Ace visited Onigashima. Elsewhere, Marco joins the fray on the Performance Floor to help soothe the infected and to offer Zoro a ride.

Manga Chapter(s): 998-999
Anime Episode(s): 1012-1014

videos.title: Straw Hat Luffy
videos.overview:
Yamato recalls learning the sad truth about Ace, but remembers what he said about his brother, Straw Hat Luffy. As Kaido and Big Mom join forces on the roof of Onigashima, they are faced with the biggest names of the Worst Generation...

Manga Chapter(s): 1000
Anime Episode(s): 1015

videos.title: The Battle of Monsters on Onigashima
videos.overview:
It's a fight to remember! Five members from the Worst Generation—Monkey D. Luffy, Eustass "Captain" Kid, Trafalgar Law, Roronoa Zoro, and Killer—facing off against two Emperors—Kaido, "King of the Beasts," and Charlotte Linlin, a.k.a. Big Mom!

Manga Chapter(s): 1001-1002
Anime Episode(s): 1016-1017

videos.title: New Emperors
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats rave over new bounties, and Crocodile and Mihawk pay Buggy a visit. Elsewhere, Dragon and his revolutionaries are shocked when they read about Sabo in the news, and an old comrade returns, a shell of his former self.

Manga Chapter(s): 1058-1059
Anime Episode(s): 1086-1088

videos.title: The Matter Involving Captain Koby
videos.overview:
The three-way struggle between the Marines, the Blackbeard Pirates, and the Kuja Pirates comes to an end when an unexpected figure shows up. On the Sunny, the Straw Hats talk about the recent incidents around the world and Luffy's words surprise everyone.

Manga Chapter(s): 1059-1060
Anime Episode(s): 1087-1088

videos.title: Future Island Egghead
videos.overview:
Sabo contacts his comrades, which prompts a certain eavesdropper to take action against an entire island nation! Meanwhile, Luffy, Chopper, and Jinbe alongside a mysterious girl become separated from the rest of the Straw Hats when a giant shark attacks.

Manga Chapter(s): 1060-1061
Anime Episode(s): 1089-1090

videos.title: Adventure in the Land of Science
videos.overview:
Franky and Luffy's groups are split up, but each encounter a person claiming to be Dr. Vegapunk. On the island, Luffy and co. find convenient food and futuristic clothing, but when a pacifista shows up, Bonney reveals her shocking relationship with Kuma.

Manga Chapter(s): 1062-1063
Anime Episode(s): 1091-1093

videos.title: The Six Vegapunks
videos.overview:
Lilith takes the Sunny and its remaining crew to the laboratory in the clouds, where a new threat lurking within its corridors attacks unexpectedly. As the battle ensues, Vegapunk's satellites look on with excitement.

Manga Chapter(s): 1064-1065
Anime Episode(s): 1093-1095

videos.title: The Will of Ohara
videos.overview:
Vegapunk Shaka shares his theory about an ancient kingdom and the Void Century. He also reminisces about the foundation of Dragon's Revolutionary Army. Meanwhile, Luffy and Chopper try to activate the giant robot when something surprising happens.

Manga Chapter(s): 1066
Anime Episode(s): 1096-1097

videos.title: Punk Records
videos.overview:
After Vegapunk shares his dream with Luffy's group, he asks the Straw Hat captain for a big favor. Meanwhile, CP0 ignores their lack of invitation to Egghead and get around the island defenses to make landfall.

Manga Chapter(s): 1067-1068
Anime Episode(s): 1097-1099

videos.title: The Strongest Form of Humanity
videos.overview:
As the rematch between Luffy and Lucci kicks off, Dr. Vegapunk notices something very fascinating about the Straw Hat captain's new abilities. Meanwhile, Sentomaru arrives with the latest pacifista models as a very unlikely ally to the pirates!

Manga Chapter(s): 1069-1070
Anime Episode(s): 1099-1102

videos.title: The Weight of Memory
videos.overview:
To avenge her father, Bonney chases Dr. Vegapunk through the lab, but a familiar symbol catches her eye. As she investigates, the satellites call in an unexpected favor to finally deal with CP0's rampage outside the lab.

Manga Chapter(s): 1071-1072
Anime Episode(s): 1102-1104

videos.title: Miss Buckingham Stussy
videos.overview:
Upon mysterious orders, Stussy betrays Lucci and Kaku. Lilith and Edison also hurry outside the lab to stop the rampaging seraphim. Meanwhile, the main Dr. Vegapunk goes missing, and Admiral Kizaru escorts a powerful and commanding entity toward Egghead.

Manga Chapter(s): 1073-1074
Anime Episode(s): 1104-1107

videos.title: Labophase Death Game
videos.overview:
The search for Dr. Vegapunk's main body is threatened by the deadly seraphim, only this time the satellites' orders are unable to pacify them. Faced with a tough decision, Luffy and Zoro must team up with the most unlikely of allies.

Manga Chapter(s): 1075-1076
Anime Episode(s): 1107-1109

videos.title: Escape Limit
videos.overview:
Luffy, Zoro, Lucci, and Kaku combine their might, and a chivalrous cook rescues Nami from near defeat. Meanwhile, Lilith, Usopp, and Franky are stopped in their tracks by someone very deadly, yet very cute.

Manga Chapter(s): 1077-1078
Anime Episode(s): 1108, 1110-1111

videos.title: The Emperor's Crew, The Red Hair Pirates
videos.overview:
Eustass "Captain" Kid sails in, guns blazing against Elbaph while Shanks of the Red Hair Pirates defends his crew and friends... without an ounce of mercy.

Manga Chapter(s): 1079
Anime Episode(s): 1112

videos.title: The Legendary Hero
videos.overview:
While Koby desperately attempts to flee Beehive, Cross Guild's bounty entices the hundreds of pirates there to hunt him down. But before they can seal his fate and claim the prize, a familiar Marine warship descends from the sky!

Manga Chapter(s): 1080-1081
Anime Episode(s): 1113-1115

videos.title: Let's Go and Take It!!
videos.overview:
While Cross Guild grows into a serious concern for the Marines, Buggy makes an impassioned speech to spur his crew into a zealous fervor. Additionally, Sabo returns to his comrades and begins his report on the events that happened at the Reverie.

Manga Chapter(s): 1082-1083
Anime Episode(s): 1116-1117

videos.title: The Attempted Murder of a Celestial Dragon
videos.overview:
During the Reverie, Sabo and Bonney met and worked together toward the same goal. King Cobra also met with the Five Elders to ask some hard questions, in the process learning the dark truth of the world.

Manga Chapter(s): 1084-1085
Anime Episode(s): 1118-1119

videos.title: The Five Elders
videos.overview:
At the time of the Reverie, Wapol overheard something he shouldn't have and fled the Holy Land with an unlikely partner. On the heels of these events, Imu ordered the Five Elders to test a devastating weapon engineered by Dr. Vegapunk!

Manga Chapter(s): 1085-1086
Anime Episode(s): 1119-1120

videos.title: The Final Lesson
videos.overview:
At Pirate Island, Vice Admiral Garp continues the Koby extraction mission, but Avalo Pizarro's devil fruit powers threaten to sink the rescue ship. Garp, weakened from an attack by Shiryu, entrusts the operation's success to the next generation.

Manga Chapter(s): 1087-1088
Anime Episode(s): 1121-1122

videos.title: Hostage Situation
videos.overview:
In the Labophase on Egghead, which is completely surrounded by the Marines, Luffy and the others devise a plan to escape the island. However, the Frontier Dome, the laser defense system, cannot be deactivated without York's secret passcode.

Manga Chapter(s): 1089-1090
Anime Episode(s): 1123-1124

videos.title: Sentomaru
videos.overview:
Admiral Kizaru finally makes landfall, but Sentomaru stands in his way while the Straw Hats attempt to move the Sunny to the back side of the island. And back at Mary Geoise, Fleet Admiral Akainu stands in the way of the ever-advancing Kuma.

Manga Chapter(s): 1091-1092
Anime Episode(s): 1125-1126

videos.title: Luffy vs. Kizaru
videos.overview:
Luffy faces off in a spectacular aerial battle against Admiral Kizaru, but this time, Straw Hat is 100 times stronger than before. Unbeknownst to those on Egghead, something ominous is about to make an appearance on the island...

Manga Chapter(s): 940-941
Anime Episode(s): 936-938

videos.title: Kumachi
videos.overview:
Born with the rare blood of the Buccaneer people, young Kuma was fated to lead a life of persecution at the hands of the Celestial Dragons, but his father instilled hope within him through the legend of Nika and the Drums of Liberation.

Manga Chapter(s): 941-943
Anime Episode(s): 939-940

videos.title: Ginny
videos.overview:
Kuma lived with Ginny in his old village until the injustices of the world pushed them to join Iva and Dragon as revolutionaries. However, when tragedy befell Ginny, Kuma found a new purpose in life in the newborn she left behind.

Manga Chapter(s): 943-944
Anime Episode(s): 941-943

videos.title: Romance Dawn, the Dawn of an Adventure
videos.overview:
Influenced by the straw-hat-wearing pirate Red-Haired Shanks, an enthusiastic young boy named Monkey D. Luffy dreams of one day becoming King of the Pirates.

Manga Chapter(s): 1
Anime Episode(s): 312

videos.title: They Call Him "Straw Hat" Luffy
videos.overview:
While Alvida and her pirates plunder a cruise ship, they come across a barrel containing a strange boy named Monkey D. Luffy. The timid Koby befriends Luffy, and they share their grand dreams with each other.

Manga Chapter(s): 2
Anime Episode(s): 1

videos.title: The Pirate King and the Master Swordsman
videos.overview:
In search of members for his pirate crew, Luffy with his new friend Koby arrive at Shells Town. There, they track down the renowned Pirate Hunter Zoro but run afoul of Helmeppo, son of the infamous Captain Morgan.

Manga Chapter(s): 3-4
Anime Episode(s): 2, 19

videos.title: The First
videos.overview:
Luffy convinces the captive Zoro to join his pirate crew, but they must first defeat the tyrannical Captain Morgan.

Manga Chapter(s): 5-7
Anime Episode(s): 3

videos.title: Enter: Nami
videos.overview:
Nami, a street-smart girl who loves money and tangerines, makes Luffy's acquaintance. To save herself and steal a map to the Grand Line, she tricks Luffy into allowing her to turn him over to the infamous pirate Buggy the Clown.

Manga Chapter(s): 8-11
Anime Episode(s): 4-6

videos.title: Treasure
videos.overview:
Luffy meets a small dog guarding his late master's store. Meanwhile, Beast Tamer Mohji, Cabaji the Acrobat, and the lion Richie show up in the streets of Orange Town to get revenge for Captain Buggy's humiliating loss.

Manga Chapter(s): 12-19
Anime Episode(s): 6-7

videos.title: Pirate Buggy "the Clown"
videos.overview:
Shockingly, it turns out Captain Buggy and Red-Haired Shanks share a common history. When the bombastic clown rips Shanks' straw hat, Luffy's rage knows no bounds.

Manga Chapter(s): 19-21
Anime Episode(s): 8

videos.title: Captain Usopp
videos.overview:
With Nami joining as Luffy's navigator (though not as an actual member of the crew), they arrive at Syrup Village in search of a proper ship. There they meet a man claiming to be a pirate captain who also seems to have ties to Red-Haired Shanks.

Manga Chapter(s): 23-25
Anime Episode(s): 9-10

videos.title: Captain Kuro
videos.overview:
After uncovering a devious plot, Usopp warns the village and Kaya, but finds his years of lying make it difficult to convince people of the truth.

Manga Chapter(s): 26-27
Anime Episode(s): 10-11

videos.title: The Slope
videos.overview:
Usopp resolves that if he is to keep the peace, the town must continue to believe he is a liar, which means he cannot let Captain Kuro's men up the slope to the village! Luffy, Zoro, and Nami aid Usopp in his plan to keep the Black Cat Pirates at bay.

Manga Chapter(s): 28-30
Anime Episode(s): 12-13

videos.title: The Silent Man
videos.overview:
Captain Kuro makes his appearance, and with Zoro too injured to fight, Luffy incapacitated, and Usopp and Nami too weak to make a stand, the situation is desperate. However, Kaya herself arrives, intent on bargaining with Kuro.

Manga Chapter(s): 31-34
Anime Episode(s): 13-14

videos.title: The Pirate "Kuro of a Hundred Plans"
videos.overview:
While the fight between Luffy and Kuro continues, Jango works to force Kaya to bequeath her family's money to the Black Cat captain. Despite the Usopp Pirates' efforts to stop the hypnotist, it seems as if the transaction is all but inevitable.

Manga Chapter(s): 35-37
Anime Episode(s): 15-16

videos.title: For Whom the Bell Tolls
videos.overview:
Kuro's ultimate move attacks everything in the area, friend nor foe notwithstanding, and Luffy becomes enraged by Kuro's lack of regard for his crew.

Manga Chapter(s): 38-39
Anime Episode(s): 16-17

videos.title: To the Sea
videos.overview:
The island is saved without any villagers ever knowing what almost befell their home. Kaya, grateful to the Straw Hats for what they did, gifts them something invaluable for sailing the high seas. Meanwhile, one more person joins Luffy's crew.

Manga Chapter(s): 40-41
Anime Episode(s): 17

videos.title: You're the Rare Breed
videos.overview:
With Usopp now on the crew and their new ship, the Going Merry, under their command, the Straw Hats head to an island said to hold a fabled treasure. There they encounter a strange man stuck in a box who has been looking for the same treasure.

Manga Chapter(s): 42, 22
Anime Episode(s): 18

videos.title: Enter: Sanji
videos.overview:
The Straw Hats happen across Zoro's former partners, Yosaku and Johnny, whose dietary dilemma reminds the pirates they still need a cook on their ship. Thus, they set sail for the sea restaurant Baratie, hoping to snag a chef.

Manga Chapter(s): 42-44
Anime Episode(s): 19-21

videos.title: Pirate Commodore Don Krieg
videos.overview:
Luffy is on hiatus from pirating to work as a cabin boy to pay off the damage done to the Baratie. While he tries to convince Sanji to join his crew, the pirate Gin brings the infamous Don Krieg and his starving forces to the sea restaurant.

Manga Chapter(s): 45-47
Anime Episode(s): 21-23

videos.title: The Oath
videos.overview:
As Nami steals the Going Merry, Hawk-Eye Mihawk, known far and wide as the world's greatest swordsman, arrives all the way from the Grand Line to finish off Don Krieg. However, Zoro challenges the deadly Mihawk to a duel in order to achieve his dream.

Manga Chapter(s): 48-52
Anime Episode(s): 23-24, 29, 135

videos.title: Pearl
videos.overview:
Mihawk departs after defeating Zoro, and Krieg continues his assault on the Baratie. Pearl, one of Krieg's strongest men, goes on the offensive with fiery attacks and multiple shields at his disposal, so Sanji reveals his unique fighting style.

Manga Chapter(s): 53-55
Anime Episode(s): 25

videos.title: Because of a Dream
videos.overview:
Sanji continues to battle Pearl, but Gin cleverly holds Chef Zeff hostage, forcing Sanji an impossible situation. Sanji's childhood memories flood his mind, and he reflects on why Zeff means so much to him.

Manga Chapter(s): 56-59
Anime Episode(s): 26

videos.title: MH5
videos.overview:
In a surprising twist, Gin finishes Pearl off himself, claiming Sanji as his own target. Though still wounded, Sanji rises to the challenge and faces off with Gin. As the battle draws to a close, Don Krieg unleashes a deadly toxin into the air.

Manga Chapter(s): 59-63
Anime Episode(s): 27-28

videos.title: The Stalwart War Spear
videos.overview:
The struggle with Krieg nears its end. Luffy's fighting spirit is unwavering, even after taking several hits from Krieg's Stalwart War Spear. Straw Hat's strategy shifts to smashing through Krieg's defenses and attacking the spear head-on.

Manga Chapter(s): 63-67
Anime Episode(s): 28-29

videos.title: The Fourth
videos.overview:
As the dust of battle settles, the still poisoned Gin decides to go back to the Grand Line with Krieg, and Sanji makes the difficult decision to join Luffy's crew. Suddenly, Yosaku returns with news of where Nami took the Going Merry.

Manga Chapter(s): 67-68
